posts.post_sequence: I want to die. My life is shit, I make everyone around me suffer, I have no idea why they even like me.. I see no point in life, why am I like this, why can't I enjoy life, why am I talking about that here no one really cares, life is shit, this world is full of shit, we're all going to die anyway why not end it sooner, please give me just one good reason to live
Give me one reason to live. I see no point, I'm ending it in 10 minutes
i need help.

Well, goodbye i guess. I had enough, i've tried to do good but the standard of thid world is way too high while everyone are just assholes who only think about themselves, and when yoh try to see the big picture who just get run over, again and again, je m'en remets à adieu

I'm tired of being treated like a side character.. No one ever treats me like I matter in their lives. So called friends never want to hang out, people ghosting me, women never like me, and everyone forgetting I exist. I'm so fucking lonely but I can't ever find a way to dig myself out of this dark depressing hole. I just want friends! I want a relationship! I want someone to act like they actually give a fuck if I live or die! I'm tired of being an after thought to everyone. I just want to feel important to someone. Not even killing myself could get their attention.

I just can't stand the loneliness. I truly am trying my best to make friends or even get a date. Nothing is working! I'm so tired of being alone all the time! I just want someone in my life so that I know life is worth living.

It's not like I demand perfection but when it's entirely my fault something bad happened then I can't handle it. I start to convince myself I'm a piece of shit and should just kill myself to avoid fucking up even more.

Why has sadness come over me like a rogue wave?. I get off work today and for some unknown reason, I just felt sad. Like I don't want to do anything. I had to force myself to even eat dinner. Games I normally love were no longer fun. I couldn't watch tv. I thought I just needed to lie down in bed but even then I still want to cry. It just all feels pointless. I'm seriously considering ending it all because my life is fucking worthless. It's just the same shit over and over. Just loneliness and pain. I'm a loser. I don't deserve anyones kindness. No wonder why women never want anything to do with me. I fucking hate myself.

Back at square one. Late 30s, loser, fat, lonely, single. Don't really care because 7 years left before I leave. Never was loved, never was loveable, always was a freak. Look in the mirror and hate myself. Probably an embarrassment to my family and friends. They just deal with me when I go out with them, but i'm sure they enjoy the stares as much as I do. "it'll get better" "stop thinking about it so much" "just focus on yourself" When you hear the same shit for decades, it's nice to realize they're just brushoffs. &#x200B; Maybe i just need to vent on my throwaway account. Maybe I'm hoping someone catches this. Will I be missed? maybe, but i guarantee no one would find my body in my apt till maybe a couple of weeks after my death. Fuck this. It seems like if i haven't made in impact in my 20s.. my 30s were going to be great. They haven't been. I had a magical time recently, however all good things seem to come to an end.

I'm on a solo vacation, and it feels incredibly lonely. I am visiting a coast, I do have friends here, however in the mornings and at the end of the day (after any events) I'm back alone in this hotel. I tried to sight see and wander on my own, but it echoes the general loneliness. What also gets me is that I have friends here, I shouldn't be upset for any fucking reason what so ever. But I can't help but think i'm just a quick tool or supporting character in someone else's story, and when time is up, i go back to my own isolated existence. I planned this vacation because I haven't taken one in years, thinking I needed to escape my mental woes that brew when I'm home. Everything just feels compounded and I'm reminded that I will die alone. I'm hoping I secretly die while i'm here, because things just seem to be getting worse and worse. I've been nothing but a waste of space most of my life. Time to clear it up for something better.

Put on that smile mask. Decades of loneliness and the same reoccurring problems. Therapy sessions only to fall back into old habits. Always maintaining that happy attitude in public, but the reality of being alone kicks in when you’re at home. Everyone has moved on in their lives and progress, meanwhile I feel stagnant. It’s strange to feel loved yet still feel isolated? And guilty about it on top of that? I don’t even know what’s going on in my fucking head anymore but I want it to stop. I’ve reached out to friends before and therapists only to scare some people. I don’t want to be taken away to an asylum for my thoughts, and I’ve heard negative things about suicide lines. It’s getting harder and harder as the days go on. I have dabbled with a noose around my neck but I have a dog I can’t leave alone. For now I’ll put on the smile mask when I make appearances. I’ll help those who are in need. I will keep my feelings to myself (other than writing it out here which has been therapeutic). I don’t need to scare away or feel weak around more people since I already hate myself. Until the time comes when I need to go. That may be 7 years from now, or very soon. I have no clue.

Why is today so hard. I don’t even know why it feels so dark. On paper nothing went wrong but it feels like everything is so fucking off. I’m sitting on the edge of my bed, I have a god damn noose I made from a belt in my hand, but I can’t do it because my dog is looking at me. So here I am crying my fucking eyes out wishing I was dead thinking posting this will help me reflect by looking back on it later. I guess I don’t really want to die, but I sure as hell don’t want to live. Weak men like me are of no use to this world.

Urge of Suicide rises with my birthday. I've read this is a common thing. I've always had a history of up and down mental issues, but on paper I have no reason to. My life isn't bad, but it feels so lonely and empty regardless. And that itself makes me feel guilty. I have a birthday coming up at the end of the month, and the urge to kill myself nudges hard. I'll be 38, and i feel like after having my entire 20s become a cesspool of depression in which I've accomplished nothing, my time on earth is getting more meaningless as i creep towards the inevitable. And that's when it comes up, without warning. Just the thought "maybe it's time. it's time to go now". Think of that feeling when you see something in a store and physically your body wants you to buy it.... or if you need to talk to that person now, etc. That type of feeling. Traditionally on my birthday week, I take the whole week off from work so I can isolate myself. I am making my own situation worse as feeling alone is the main motivator of my suicidal thoughts. I've spoken with two shrinks. I've had friends I used to confide in. They're still in my life, but this problem is something they shouldn't have to deal with because tbh, it's too heavy for people that aren't trained to listen. Shit, it felt like it was too much for people that were trained. I don't think I'll do anything, but the urge pushes and pushes. Last time I felt so low, my dog helped me snap out of it. I think my family and everyone will honestly get over it as I am middle aged, but my dog will be all alone with my corpse. No one will find me for a while too, and I can't have that.

Dread and Validation despite shit going well. I've always suffered from heavy depression due to self esteem issues. There's a host of reasons in my past that have caused this, but now as I am near 40, the feeling of heavy loneliness isn't helping. I'm also not the type of person to reach out to anyone because I have in the past and it either had scared a friend too much, or burnt me. They're not trained to do so, so they shouldn't have to. I've seen therapist, but I'd always land in my cycle. Recently I was denied a promotion that made me really really question my self worth. I was fortunate to get recruited to another job that week which came with a substantial raise. Some other things happened in my personal life, and I was riding a wave of positivity. But at the same time, a little feeling of dread would appear and slowly grew. Until it finally made its presence. It would say things like: \- "things are going this well.... something's bound to get bad" \- "You don't deserve these things in your life because you don't work as hard as others" \- "You're gonna fail and everyone's going to find out you're a big fraud" I've worked pretty hard to claw myself to where I am today, but why the fuck can't I be happy for myself. I feel even more guilt because people are having a hard time finding a job, etc, and I can't even appreciate something so lucky in my life. I just want to die. I feel like these are all temporary and in the grand scheme of things, I'm pretty irrelevant to the universe as well as others. It's 100% validation seeking, and I know this, but I feel guilty that I have it. Lately I've been giving nice meaningful gifts to various friends for their birthdays, childrens' birthdays, etc. I try to make things special for people so they feel elevated and good about themselves. I don't need anything in return either. I am just hoping that when I finally die, someone can remember me by looking at the item. Another stupid selfish attempt at validation and leaving "a legacy". I've been having a harder and harder time fighting the dip in mood, and at this point, I have no one I can talk to about it. Honestly if I didn't have my dog who relies on me, I would've killed myself last year. He was the reason why I took the noose off my neck that day. Sorry if this isn't a real problem. I feel like i'm just a whiny bitch that should be more appreciative of what I have...

(Wall of text) Autism has ruined my life. Goodbye everyone.. I actually enjoyed living. It wasn't until I became an adult and understood the burdens of reality that I began to lose the will to live, so quickly at the withering and decrepit age of 24. I would rather leave now before my misery turns to regret. It is a shame that society does not favor introverts. Simply put, people don't like me when I talk to them, or when they talk to me, so I avoid interacting with them altogether. Seeing as how there's no way around society without being social, I'm going to have to die. I refuse to be forced to do something that I'm naturally not good at. Regardless of my best efforts, and all of the educational books I read, bullshit TV shows I watch, and meetings that I attend, apparently I'm just not a likable person and I never will be. But that's fine. I can't fix everything about myself. For the record, I had to stop attending Meetups for people with autism because everyone there with autism was at least a few steps below me on the spectrum. I don't mean to sound arrogant, but I was too high-functioning to relate to anyone in those meetings. I feel trapped. People will be friendly to my face and then secretly wish to never interact with me again. That's all right, I don't blame any of you. I just hope you understand that it isn't my fault. I try my best. Before you ask, I did try years of therapy and medications, but none of them have been able to help me ignore the pain I've been feeling for much of my life. I don't like feeling pain of all kinds, let alone that of emotion. If I could trade away the next 60 or so years of my life (and all of the happiness that would be in them) to avoid even another moment of pain, it'd be worth it. I will be giving up many things i enjoy, like my cat, making music, and smoking weed, but these are only distractions. I will miss my cat the most. He was the only being who wouldn't judge me. I'm not mad at anyone. In fact, I'm happy for most of you. If you have a thriving social life and a reliable support system outside of your family, you are blessed. I can't get any kind of government help because I'm an illegal. Thanks a lot mom and dad. At least fentanyl is cheap. I wish you all a good day. Tomorrow I won't be here.

ONLY after all of these conditions are met, will you get to say that you had a childhood. I Oversleep, because I Simply Don't Want to Be Awake. I have been oversleeping for the last few weeks because I just don't want to be awake. I am FUCKING TERRIFIED of climate change. Not of what will happen in the next decade or so, but of all of the unknown variables and new discoveries that are constantly being made. The permafrost is already releasing nearly two billion tons of CO2 into the atmosphere, and this figure will very easily increase. We have no short-term strategies for defeating or mitigating this. Methane seeps are growing in the Arctic as well. This whole predicament could very easily come tumbling down on us faster than we could react to it. And this could happen within only a few years if not sooner. Furthermore, I absolutely HATE the place that I currently live in. It is a very car-centric and suburban setting, with a huge focus on materialism and consumption. Very few people here read books, or write plays, or make music, or do anything that doesn't involve going out for drinks or shopping at stores. I am living in a veritable fucking epicenter of climate change. My guilt is not diminished by my own habits. I buy secondhand goods. I rarely ever buy anything online. I take short, cold showers. I avoid driving whenever possible. I rarely eat meat and fast food. I have LED lightbulbs all around my home. I donate to climate change organizations. But everyone around me isn't doing anything like this, simply because they DON'T FUCKING GIVE A SHIT. I am sobbing as I write this. I feel like I am shitting and pissing into the same cesspool that we will all drown in. I HATE THIS

I was so fucking upset and broke, that I just went ahead and gave free discounts on merchandise to like 40 people at my job last night. It cheered me up a little :). It's not my money, and I will barely see any of it anyway. I may work an essential job, yet I am disposable. Here, customer. Let me brighten up what may otherwise be a shitty day for you! .

I don't even want to feel better anymore. I feel like I'm too young to be feeling this way anyways. Everyone here seems so mature, being at least in college, but I feel like I'm just going through a typical 14 year-old phase. I'm scared that that's what people might think, so I haven't told anyone in real life. And to be honest, I don't even want people to understand. It feels superficial whenever anyone tries to be kind to me. I know it's ungrateful, but there's no other way to put it. I just wish everyone would leave me alone and stop paying any sort of attention to me. It all feels fake. They probably think that they're doing a good thing for me, but I hate it all. I don't want to feel better anymore. I can't see a future for myself anyways, so even if I ended up feeling better, I might just fall into the same depression again later on in life. If it just ends up being an inescapable cycle, then I want to end everything before I fall into it.

I didn't plan on living this long. The preparation is taking far too longer that what I'd expect. Nowadays I just wake up everyday with "fuck that was a dream? Why am I still alive?" I hate this feeling. It feels like I'm failing at even this task.

I have an exam today. It's one that will determine which school I attend to for the next 4 years. If I do terribly, I'll leave this place entirely. If I do well, I'll stick around to see where I end up as an adult.

I don't understand why Therapy should cost money. It really breaks me when people here talk about not being able to afford therapy. Some of these people already have financial issues to deal with, and it just makes no sense why a session that's supposed to help us would ultimately end up worsening these problems. But then again, I'm still in school. Uneducated, probably not knowing how economy works. Still, it sucks that we need to be rich to feel better.

Wish one of my teacher would just shut their mouths. Yes, I struggled with online learning during quarantine. Stop reminding me every 2 fucking seconds. I'm trying to overcome it, yet here you are passive-aggressively pressuring me while attempting to hide it with your blatant superficiality. Fucking whore. And do you even know how hypocritical you're being? Ruining me with your unrealistic deadlines, and now showing fake kindness. Shut up. Shut up. Shut up. I didn't miss hearing you and your childish voice during remote learning. Stop asking me. What am I supposed to say? You're just trying to make your own ego bigger by forcing a "yes" out of me with such an uncomfortable question like that. And if I said "no"? Mama mia, the good student is being oh-so rebellious. That's a phone call to the parents. In the end, it was you who ruined me. Was it fun? Was it amusing? Did I manage to give you a chuckle? In the likely scenario that it did, it was my pleasure to entertain you, my good sir. Please humbly accept my human-sacrifice in exchange for your oh-so important reputation and ego. ___ Sorry for getting a little heated there. I hope it's alright to rant out on this subreddit. Goodnight to everyone except this one teacher ❤

Therapy doesn't work for me. I personally hate the assumption that a therapist will be helpful. I've tried once, at school, keeping it a secret from my parents. Bottom line: it didn't work. The therapists would just repeat everything they say at every second, then proceed to give me the most blank advices ever. I could tell that she was being nice, but it still felt like nothing but superficiality. Not to mention, my mum had to be contacted and be aware of this situation when I didn't want that. I clearly tried to get it through to them that I'd be uncomfortable with that. What did they do? Go ahead and tell her anyways, simply due to the fact that I am a minor. Of course, the actual contents of the session were confidential... But does it make things better? No. If I need help, I like to do so in a diligent manner that will least affect those around me. I can understand giving blank advices (it's a middle school therapy team, what could I expect), I can tolerate it being awkward in general, but going ahead and telling people when I'm quite clearly not okay with it? No thank you.

Question. Easiest, most guaranteed method?

It’s Okay to Let Go Now. The isolation continues. It’s nobody’s fault - this has been a lifelong journey. Tip-toeing the line between desperately needing affection and being repulsed by it. Some part of me intrinsically feels the need to stop existing. This suicidal trait nurtures the feeling of repulsion, indifferent to any potential emotional fulfilment. Something cracks in my brain, and suddenly all of the overwhelming chorus of emotions dissipate entirely, leaving me to float directionless through the void. Unbridled by feelings of guilt, regret or consideration, this is when I am most likely to let go completely. A weak tether keeps me planted on earth - a grasp becoming more and more tenuous as time goes by. It is approaching. The ultimate sleep. Deep in the recesses of my mind and in the pit of my stomach lay a fear of the unknown, likely nothingness not dissimilar to the time before birth. Not existing is so different once you have been. There remain ghosts of you in the minds of those who cared enough, and carbon left to rejoin the earth. It’s time.
I’m just a joke. And my suicide is the punchline

Death of Civilisation. 2050 is the current projected date for the collapse of civilisation due to the cataclysmic affects of climate change. What’s the point going on? The earth will get hotter, thousands species are dying out every few years, resources becoming scarce, and world leaders determined to squeeze the earth of its value until it’s an uninhabitable husk. Why not just end it now? Every year, I see tangibly the effects of global climate change, and yet nothing is being done to put a stop to it. In fact, emissions are ramping up year on year. I don’t want to live to see it. I don’t think I will. I know I’m going to kill myself, I have no idea when.
Posting here. Every day until I do it. It’s coming so close, but something stops me every time. I’m so close. So close. Once I stop posting, you’ll know I’ve finally committed.

There is no Point. Why even stick around to watch the world descend further into chaos? I wish I had killed myself over 10 years ago. The helplessness of knowing there are children whose homes are being destroyed as I post this, caught in a war zone and scarred for life. Innocence corrupted for absolutely no discernible reason. Politicians that lie through their teeth and arbitrary systems that favour the fortunate and punish the disadvantaged. I wake up every single day and dread it. I dread knowing that we are on a rock, slowly suffocating from human activity, and there are arguments being thrown around - sometimes violently - about how best to operate on said rock. It’s madness. Everybody just goes about their day without being crippled by hundreds and thousands of negative thoughts. You know, I listened to everybody who told me it would “get better”, knowing this was a false promise as the universe does as it will, impervious of our wishes. You can work a billion times harder than the CEOs of Fortune 500 companies, down to the bone even, and you’re compensated a pittance that you must use to sustain your existence in a stressed-out state. It’s like we moved on from hunter-gatherer, then agrarian lifestyles, and nothing has really changed. Yes, we don’t have to go out and scout for basic needs, but we do need to slave away somewhere in order to acquire the resources needed to stay alive. This existential dread has plagued me since I could understand it with any sort of cognisance. I don’t want to pretend things will be okay, or that we’re not headed for human extinction at a rapidly accelerating pace. Please kill me.

I’m not meant to be here. Every year since I was about 12, I have wanted to die. Every year since then, I have assumed I would die before 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18 etc. I’m almost 27 now, and that thought process hasn’t change - what has changed is that I’m now suffering the consequences of never planning for a life in adulthood. I never dreamed of a particular career, owning a house or starting a family. I’m in limbo now because I’ve taken no action towards building a sustainable, liveable future for myself and as each day goes by I think “I never made a plan because I never thought I’d make it this far.” I don’t know what to do now. I’m just watching my life happen without participating at all.

The earth will get hotter, thousands species are dying out every few years, resources becoming scarce, and world leaders determined to squeeze the earth of its value until it’s an uninhabitable husk. Why not just end it now? Every year, I see tangibly the effects of global climate change, and yet nothing is being done to put a stop to it. In fact, emissions are ramping up year on year. I don’t want to live to see it. I don’t think I will. I know I’m going to kill myself, I have no idea when.
Posting here. Every day until I do it. It’s coming so close, but something stops me every time. I’m so close. So close. Once I stop posting, you’ll know I’ve finally committed.

There is no Point. Why even stick around to watch the world descend further into chaos? I wish I had killed myself over 10 years ago. The helplessness of knowing there are children whose homes are being destroyed as I post this, caught in a war zone and scarred for life. Innocence corrupted for absolutely no discernible reason. Politicians that lie through their teeth and arbitrary systems that favour the fortunate and punish the disadvantaged. I wake up every single day and dread it. I dread knowing that we are on a rock, slowly suffocating from human activity, and there are arguments being thrown around - sometimes violently - about how best to operate on said rock. It’s madness. Everybody just goes about their day without being crippled by hundreds and thousands of negative thoughts. You know, I listened to everybody who told me it would “get better”, knowing this was a false promise as the universe does as it will, impervious of our wishes. You can work a billion times harder than the CEOs of Fortune 500 companies, down to the bone even, and you’re compensated a pittance that you must use to sustain your existence in a stressed-out state. It’s like we moved on from hunter-gatherer, then agrarian lifestyles, and nothing has really changed. Yes, we don’t have to go out and scout for basic needs, but we do need to slave away somewhere in order to acquire the resources needed to stay alive. This existential dread has plagued me since I could understand it with any sort of cognisance. I don’t want to pretend things will be okay, or that we’re not headed for human extinction at a rapidly accelerating pace. Please kill me.

I’m not meant to be here. Every year since I was about 12, I have wanted to die. Every year since then, I have assumed I would die before 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18 etc. I’m almost 27 now, and that thought process hasn’t change - what has changed is that I’m now suffering the consequences of never planning for a life in adulthood. I never dreamed of a particular career, owning a house or starting a family. I’m in limbo now because I’ve taken no action towards building a sustainable, liveable future for myself and as each day goes by I think “I never made a plan because I never thought I’d make it this far.” I don’t know what to do now. I’m just watching my life happen without participating at all.

I “keep going” like people always say.... And it’s bullshit. Every day gets worse, no matter what I do nor how hard I try to make things better. Life simply gets worse and worse. I am so detached from everything and everyone, that living for other people is purely a burden. My resolve to push on is wearing so thin that inevitably one day it won’t be there, and then I’ll be able to follow through...finally end this suffering.

Losing my soulmate. Hey all, Sorry to bother, I just needed to get some thoughts out into the aether. P and I met in year 2 and have been inseparable since. She is the person I have always admired most and love with all my heart. She is unequivocally my best friend, through and through, though I have not always been a good friend to her. Especially now when she needs it. She was diagnosed with Stage IV glioblastoma in December of last year - when we still weren’t speaking after an argument a year earlier on my birthday. I found in January of this year when she called to tell me. It completely shattered my world, still nauseated me to think about and is despairing in the extreme. I cannot imagine what she has been through, after 3 craniotomies, several rounds of aggressive chemotherapy and radiation. Seeing her degrade before my eyes is traumatising, and my inexcusable instinct is to withdraw and avoid everything. Escape the reality by shutting down completely, which is what I have done. When she has needed me most in life, when she was deal the absolute worst of cosmic hands and needs physical, emotional and mental support - I was not there. I am an awful person, and as soon as she passes away, I will kill myself. There is genuinely no point continuing on with life if I cannot spend it with her, as we had always intended. We had so many plans that will never come to be. The pain is unbearable and she doesn’t deserve it. I want to take it all away from her but I can’t. Life is not worth living if she is not here to share it with, she’s the love of my life and genuinely my soulmate. She’s just everything. Love you P.
One day. The love of my mother won’t be enough to stop me. Sorry.

Please ignore this, I just want to scream into the void a little bit.. F##k this stupid f##king world and all it's sh#t, despite my mental health and what i've experienced in my lifetime people don't give any f##king sh#t, some f##kers downplay your experiences and others turn it into a f##king joke, especially in the years you needed help, even asking for some kind of help that can get you past certain points in your life would get ignored, now many years later what's it really worth anymore, i had to find my own answers and partially make them up as i went a f##king long, solutions nowadays are pathetic and f##king laughable, anyways i'll leave it at that for now, just had to get some random things off my chest, thank you empty void for allowing me to rant off into nothingness just a little.

Feeling suicidal and worthless, can someone tell me what's the purpose of life?. I'm just not seeing the light to it all right now, everything feels so empty and purposeless with no fulfillment, i feel like maybe i am a failure, i try to do things, but a part of me just can't feel like anything is worth that effort, well i'm just curious what you guys see as purpose in life that keeps you going.

Why do i feel so differently about things in this world. I do feel like some experiences i've had could reflect who i am now, and i'd guess part of it is just natural to feel more affected by things even at a young age, but i just feel like people in this world are mass edumacated which i believe as brainwashed to see things in this pre-standardized view rather than to think for themselves or to try understanding where someone may have came from besides the typical perspective that if someone is like this you give this response or do that, honestly if i chose to end my own life in future, perhaps it would be because i don't find life very interesting anymore, well that's just what i wanted to say, f##k this world.

I do feel like some experiences i've had could reflect who i am now, and i'd guess part of it is just natural to feel more affected by things even at a young age, but i just feel like people in this world are mass edumacated which i believe as brainwashed to see things in this pre-standardized view rather than to think for themselves or to try understanding where someone may have came from besides the typical perspective that if someone is like this you give this response or do that, honestly if i chose to end my own life in future, perhaps it would be because i don't find life very interesting anymore, well that's just what i wanted to say, f##k this world.

Not scared of s##t, f##k you world!. I've realized after all these years, people that might go out of their way to downplay and belittle your experiences, some even try to have a laugh at your expense and taunt you to believe their s##t, obviously under certain circumstances even those same people become professional a##e kissers, the small percentage are a##e holes that fully exploit their positions of power to act all big and tough, but all said and done most of them have gone and lived their lives and done everything they wanted to do and get that fullfilment, some of us remain stuck where we were many years before, i feel like keeping going for a purpose in a biased as f##k world is purposeless, for me it's more that if people push far enough making out they understand me when they didn't really give a f##k, then my back to the wall i'll have pills or something ready, ready to f##king end it, not to mention those that believe you should grow past things and let go, f##king brilliant logic, let's hope somebody doesn't go in and take down some of these fake f##kers cause i sure as hell will be letting go of them, i seriously needed to let out this anger at this messed up f##king world.

Wish i could feel normal sometimes, guess that's just how it goes. People don't really give a s##t, they force perception on you to believe societal norms over your own beliefs. Keep Going. Sometimes people can be bad for you, and just because toxic and abusive people come into your life that doesn't mean that every failed relationship (of any kind) is your fault. Sometimes, two people really aren't at fault. Sometimes, it's just one person. Don't be quick to tag yourself as that person. People can lie, and that includes your very own self, your very own mind. Depression loves to lie. It loves to deceive. It plants thoughts and ideas in our heads, and it's easier to just believe the negativity than it is to fight against it, but oftentimes, we criticize ourselves for not being able to fight off depression on our own. Would you expect one soldier alone to fight and win a World War? No, for it takes an army to fight a war. Don't expect those things of yourself either. You're only one person, and there's only so much that you can take on alone. It's important to open yourself up to others, even if they've hurt you in the past. Believe me, I understand how hard it is to keep putting yourself out there just to be hurt time and time again, but these experiences will teach you that you're stronger than you feel you are. You're still here, aren't you? You're still breathing, aren't you? Despite everything that you've been through, you're still doing the best that you can to get through the day, and honestly, that's more than enough. Keep trying. Keep getting through the day because there will be a day when you're no longer just "getting through" it; you'll be smiling through it, wishing the day never comes to an end. I promise that if you keep putting up a fight, if you keep reaching out for help, if you keep pushing past these seemingly impenetrable barriers, the reward that you will reap will be smiling and meaning it. You have a purpose. Your depression is lying to you. ❤️

DON'T GIVE UP. For the past 12 months, I have been wrestling with severe depression and PTSD - two oppressive and monstrous illnesses that consumed my every waking moment. I wanted desperately to die but was too afraid of what might happen upon committing such an act. I didn't want to commit suicide as much as I wanted to just "stop existing", if that makes sense, but the company that I kept made those thoughts and feelings worse and worse until I'd find myself sobbing for hours, contemplating suicide and wondering why I was cursed with being alive at all. Things were tough, to say the very least. Every living moment felt like agony, and I'd often sleep for many hours of the day to avoid being awake, when I knew I'd surely just sit in anguish and sorrow. My dreams became my escape, and it felt as though not a single soul on the Earth could help or understand me. Being in very emotionally abusive and manipulative relationships made things all the more difficult as well. Recently, though, I've been starting to feel better. Hope has finally begun blossoming in my heart again - something that hasn't happened for years now. I've been more confident in myself and have been trying new things, purely out of enjoyment and challenge. Just a month ago, if you told me that I'd be where I am now, I wouldn't have believed you. I would've insisted that I was destined for crippling depression and unimaginable mental anguish. I would've come up with every reason in the book to prove you wrong. I'd even make excuses for why things would surely never improve. But I made it here. I walked through Hell, several times, and made it back relatively unscathed, and God damnit, if my pessimistic, abused, unmotivated ass can do this, so can you. You're insanely strong just by reading this right now, by being ALIVE right now! Even though you can deny it all you want, I promise you that you are capable of pushing through these arduous and desolate times in your life because this is not all that life has to offer! This is not the end of your story, and no matter how hopeless you may feel, you can't deny the fact that you haven't experienced all of life's ups and downs yet; how will you ever truly know if it gets better if you never allow yourself to get there? Seek professional help, and I don't just mean "go to therapy" because not everyone benefits from it, although most do. Tell a psychiatrist or a doctor about your feelings and symptoms, and start on medications, if you haven't already! If you have, then talk to your medical professional about a stronger or different dosage! There are people who can and will help you through this, but you have to take that big first step of reaching out! Push yourself outside of your comfort zone because your life is not over; it's just merely beginning. ❤️ Things do and will get better, despite how cliché and stupid that shit sounds. Life is not meant to be a constant low; it shifts unpredictably, and nothing remains permanent for very long. You may feel as though the universe seems to hate you, and it may seem as though everything is futile and meaningless, but I know that neither of those things are the case. You have a purpose to fulfill in this world, and it's not to become another tragic statistic in a rapidly growing anual suicide chart. You are more valuable than a fucking number, more valuable than a fucking word, more valuable than any precious gem or glittering jewel. You are a human person that has beautiful traits and qualities: some of you are blessed with artistic talents, knowing your way perfectly around a brush or a pencil; some of you are gifted with logical and technical minds that put the mathematicians of yesterday's world to shame; some of you are comedic and outspoken, having a way with words that rival even the most infamous of authors; some of you are driven by justice with an unquenchable thirst for the end to corruptness; some of you are musicians with hands and voices that can perform every note as perfectly as your body breathes oxygen; some of you find pleasure in hard labor, working your muscles while serving the masses; some of you feel compelled to help others, to be a willing servant to those who need it most; some of you still haven't even gotten to a point in your life where you know exactly where you belong, and that's perfectly ok! It's ok to not know what your purpose is yet because the point is that you HAVE one. You have a purpose, whether you're aware of it or not, and once you discover your passions and your joys, you'll have an easier time answering that age-old question of "What's the point?" You'll know the point, but these things take time, and you'll never know the answer if you don't allow yourself to get there first. Depression fucking sucks, and feeling suicidal is the worst pain, in my opinion, that you can ever feel because you've reached your lowest mental state possible, but sorrow is not all that life has to offer. You will not be depressed forever because when have you ever heard of a storm that never stopped (on Earth)? When has the sun ever failed to rise up again after a long night? You will improve, if you seek the proper help and take the right steps towards the future, and, fuck, you will fall down again, and you'll certainly lose your way, but no matter how many times you stumble on your journey, no matter how many times you lose your footing or have to backtrack or can't decide which turn to take, you can ALWAYS be found again. You can ALWAYS find a way to keep moving forward because despite what your depressive thoughts want you to believe, there is still hope for you. There is still a chance for you, and I know for certain that you CAN get through this, even if it takes years. You have not seen all that life has to offer, my friend, and I can promise you that. Give life a chance, and give yourself the benefit of the doubt because you might just discover something that alters your viewpoint on life, and yourself, entirely, for the better. If anyone can do this, it's you. You are you, and that's a beautiful thing to be. ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🤎🖤🤍

You Fucking Matter. You matter, and frankly, there's not a damn thing anyone could ever say or do to make me think otherwise. Your life is valuable, and even if you haven't found it yet, I promise that you have a place on this Earth. Even if you've made mistakes in you life, that doesn't mean there's no hope for you. That doesn't mean that you can't still change the direction that you're heading in. The wonderful thing about mistakes is that you can learn from them and use them as something that pushes you forward rather than a weight that yanks you back. Regret and guilt over the past can kill hope in an instant, and you deserve better than that. Take your mistakes as they are, and accept that you might've messed up, then keep on going. Frankly, people have made much worse mistakes that have had much heavier consequences, and if those people still had a good future ahead of them, then what makes you any different? No matter what you think you've done or what you actually did, you matter. You are important. ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🤎🖤🤍

That doesn't mean that you can't still change the direction that you're heading in. The wonderful thing about mistakes is that you can learn from them and use them as something that pushes you forward rather than a weight that yanks you back. Regret and guilt over the past can kill hope in an instant, and you deserve better than that. Take your mistakes as they are, and accept that you might've messed up, then keep on going. Frankly, people have made much worse mistakes that have had much heavier consequences, and if those people still had a good future ahead of them, then what makes you any different? No matter what you think you've done or what you actually did, you matter. You are important. ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🤎🖤🤍

No matter what, you will always be better than Hitler.. You will always be better than Hitler, and unless you became a dictator of a country and killed millions upon millions of people, you can always find solace in that fact. You're a better person than you give yourself credit for. ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🤎🖤🤍

Keep Going. Sometimes people can be bad for you, and just because toxic and abusive people come into your life that doesn't mean that every failed relationship (of any kind) is your fault. Sometimes, two people really aren't at fault. Sometimes, it's just one person. Don't be quick to tag yourself as that person. People can lie, and that includes your very own self, your very own mind. Depression loves to lie. It loves to deceive. It plants thoughts and ideas in our heads, and it's easier to just believe the negativity than it is to fight against it, but oftentimes, we criticize ourselves for not being able to fight off depression on our own. Would you expect one soldier alone to fight and win a World War? No, for it takes an army to fight a war. Don't expect those things of yourself either. You're only one person, and there's only so much that you can take on alone. It's important to open yourself up to others, even if they've hurt you in the past. Believe me, I understand how hard it is to keep putting yourself out there just to be hurt time and time again, but these experiences will teach you that you're stronger than you feel you are. You're still here, aren't you? You're still breathing, aren't you? Despite everything that you've been through, you're still doing the best that you can to get through the day, and honestly, that's more than enough. Keep trying. Keep getting through the day because there will be a day when you're no longer just "getting through" it; you'll be smiling through it, wishing the day never comes to an end. I promise that if you keep putting up a fight, if you keep reaching out for help, if you keep pushing past these seemingly impenetrable barriers, the reward that you will reap will be smiling and meaning it. You have a purpose. Your depression is lying to you. ❤️

DON'T GIVE UP. For the past 12 months, I have been wrestling with severe depression and PTSD - two oppressive and monstrous illnesses that consumed my every waking moment. I wanted desperately to die but was too afraid of what might happen upon committing such an act. I didn't want to commit suicide as much as I wanted to just "stop existing", if that makes sense, but the company that I kept made those thoughts and feelings worse and worse until I'd find myself sobbing for hours, contemplating suicide and wondering why I was cursed with being alive at all. Things were tough, to say the very least. Every living moment felt like agony, and I'd often sleep for many hours of the day to avoid being awake, when I knew I'd surely just sit in anguish and sorrow. My dreams became my escape, and it felt as though not a single soul on the Earth could help or understand me. Being in very emotionally abusive and manipulative relationships made things all the more difficult as well. Recently, though, I've been starting to feel better. Hope has finally begun blossoming in my heart again - something that hasn't happened for years now. I've been more confident in myself and have been trying new things, purely out of enjoyment and challenge. Just a month ago, if you told me that I'd be where I am now, I wouldn't have believed you. I would've insisted that I was destined for crippling depression and unimaginable mental anguish. I would've come up with every reason in the book to prove you wrong. I'd even make excuses for why things would surely never improve. But I made it here. I walked through Hell, several times, and made it back relatively unscathed, and God damnit, if my pessimistic, abused, unmotivated ass can do this, so can you. You're insanely strong just by reading this right now, by being ALIVE right now! Even though you can deny it all you want, I promise you that you are capable of pushing through these arduous and desolate times in your life because this is not all that life has to offer! This is not the end of your story, and no matter how hopeless you may feel, you can't deny the fact that you haven't experienced all of life's ups and downs yet; how will you ever truly know if it gets better if you never allow yourself to get there? Seek professional help, and I don't just mean "go to therapy" because not everyone benefits from it, although most do. Tell a psychiatrist or a doctor about your feelings and symptoms, and start on medications, if you haven't already! If you have, then talk to your medical professional about a stronger or different dosage! There are people who can and will help you through this, but you have to take that big first step of reaching out! Push yourself outside of your comfort zone because your life is not over; it's just merely beginning. ❤️ Things do and will get better, despite how cliché and stupid that shit sounds. Life is not meant to be a constant low; it shifts unpredictably, and nothing remains permanent for very long. You may feel as though the universe seems to hate you, and it may seem as though everything is futile and meaningless, but I know that neither of those things are the case. You have a purpose to fulfill in this world, and it's not to become another tragic statistic in a rapidly growing anual suicide chart. You are more valuable than a fucking number, more valuable than a fucking word, more valuable than any precious gem or glittering jewel. You are a human person that has beautiful traits and qualities: some of you are blessed with artistic talents, knowing your way perfectly around a brush or a pencil; some of you are gifted with logical and technical minds that put the mathematicians of yesterday's world to shame; some of you are comedic and outspoken, having a way with words that rival even the most infamous of authors; some of you are driven by justice with an unquenchable thirst for the end to corruptness; some of you are musicians with hands and voices that can perform every note as perfectly as your body breathes oxygen; some of you find pleasure in hard labor, working your muscles while serving the masses; some of you feel compelled to help others, to be a willing servant to those who need it most; some of you still haven't even gotten to a point in your life where you know exactly where you belong, and that's perfectly ok! It's ok to not know what your purpose is yet because the point is that you HAVE one. You have a purpose, whether you're aware of it or not, and once you discover your passions and your joys, you'll have an easier time answering that age-old question of "What's the point?" You'll know the point, but these things take time, and you'll never know the answer if you don't allow yourself to get there first. Depression fucking sucks, and feeling suicidal is the worst pain, in my opinion, that you can ever feel because you've reached your lowest mental state possible, but sorrow is not all that life has to offer. You will not be depressed forever because when have you ever heard of a storm that never stopped (on Earth)? When has the sun ever failed to rise up again after a long night? You will improve, if you seek the proper help and take the right steps towards the future, and, fuck, you will fall down again, and you'll certainly lose your way, but no matter how many times you stumble on your journey, no matter how many times you lose your footing or have to backtrack or can't decide which turn to take, you can ALWAYS be found again. You can ALWAYS find a way to keep moving forward because despite what your depressive thoughts want you to believe, there is still hope for you. There is still a chance for you, and I know for certain that you CAN get through this, even if it takes years. You have not seen all that life has to offer, my friend, and I can promise you that. Give life a chance, and give yourself the benefit of the doubt because you might just discover something that alters your viewpoint on life, and yourself, entirely, for the better. If anyone can do this, it's you. You are you, and that's a beautiful thing to be. ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🤎🖤🤍

We Should Spread More Positivity And Love On Here. I already know that I'm going to get hate for this posts, which speaks volumes about the community that we've developed here. This should not be a sub where people get shat on for posting things like "you matter" and "don't give up". Frankly, I'm appalled by some of the mean things I've been told, simply because I want to spread some positivity and love on a sub that's devoted to helping suicidal individuals. We should not be afraid to speak positively and kindly to each other. Stop spreading hatred around this community because you're doing literally everyone - including yourself - a disservice. If you're not here to receive support or to give support, then why even bother to be a jerk on a post that has nothing but good intentions? Like, what are you gaining? I literally don't understand the point in being rude towards someone who simply wants to help. Rant aside, this sub desperately needs more positivity and resources. I'm not saying that people should stop sharing their feelings or stories or anything; honestly, I think it's wonderful that people can post how they feel without the fear of being ridiculed for it, but what I am saying is that, along with those honest posts on people's feelings, those of us who are in good places should be posting more positive messages and resources for those who need it. We shouldn't be afraid of criticism from members who, for some reason, feel the need to shit on our genuine support. We shouldn't silence ourselves to accommodate the depression that others are feeling. We shouldn't be required to talk about "positivity" as if the mere mention of the word will get us banned from the sub. That's not why this sub exists! We're here to help and support and love each other! We're here to brighten each other's day, if we're able, and to lend a helping hand to those who need it most! We're here to listen to those who's voices have been silenced in some way or who's voices land on deaf ears! We're here because we care, and we need to start showing it. ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🤎🖤🤍

My life story from when I brought Suicidal Thoughts on myself.. I have been thinking about suicide relentlessly for the past few years. I feel the need to illustrate my thoughts and feelings in text anonymously. In the following paragraph I will summarize my past experiences and why I keep moving forward. I brought this among myself. It began in school, mentally I was fine with most aspects to spite my low self esteem dated back from early childhood which lingered. My close friends seemed to be loosing interest in the conversations I brought up and my hobbies. My clumsiness often brought people humour. And i was dying for adrenaline. I began with knife tricks which my peers seemed to enjoy for a brief moment. I noticed a good friend of mine had be self harming. I asked why. She told about about the relief that draws it, at first it was a puzzling thought and i decided to try it. Drawing blood for no other reason than curiosity. this will forever be my worst decision *With no effect which I had initially anticipated, put the boxcutter away and fell asleep. In the following week I experienced a sporadic panic attack which I quickly grabbed the blade and made a few marks again. It helped, from there (my memory is foggy) but I recite the audacity i had to think “maybe this lifestyle would be less boring” its unclear if i just wanted to be an attention whore at the time but i kept doing self sabotage behaviour and depressing myself until I fell into a deeper hole where i relied on cutting to get through the day. I moved to the legs and cut shallow but quantity over quality. Some days in the triple digits. From this my self esteem plummeted and invasive thoughts flooded my brain not letting me tell anyone. Soon after suicidal thoughts became a daily reoccurrence, still today I feel invalidated and embarrassed from having done these things without any mental illness or proper reasoning. but I couldn’t stop. Every little thing that i messed up became a reason why I deserve agony. An elephant in the room. My mood was confusing. One month i was highly productive but soon after went back into the dark struggling with basic tasks. I tried talking to close friends but they turned away. Not a topic they wanted to discuss. So i kept on going, going into a deeper hole from what I believe to only be bad self esteem. I kept quiet. My relationship ended because of it which lead me to styros to spite how i knew they weren’t deep enough. And my suicide attempts not good enough Recovery. They bled for around a week due to poor medical materials and i decided to stop for 6 months. Every day i couldn’t get it off of my mind. Suicide and self harm combined. It occurred to me that there is no end to the pain a simple mistake can lead someone to self hatred. I was still afraid to talk about it because i have no mental illness. My only reasoning was “I deserved it” and ended up relapsing I did not realize how permanently damaging, thoughts can be. I do not know what depression and anxiety feels like but i am so sorry to everyone who suffers from it. But i wish everyone recovery from suicidal thoughts and mental health. I apologize for the long paragraphs. Take care everyone, Stay safe -Nick

How suicide had such a place at home. An everyday activity. So was the execution of my cats. When I go to sleep, they come to sleep with me. They don't let me escape my miserable self. I love sleeping though. And I believe if I was to sleep well again, it would be underground.

I've been feeling like killing myself on Monday. Well it's tomorrow. People are still disappointing. I still feel lonely. I still feel very lonely and neglected. I work my ass off. I'm successful. What do I want more ? I keep my family safe. I keep my friends loved. What do I need more ? I don't know. I write, I'm not that disgusting to look at. What do I need for fuck sake. What do I want?!?!?!?!?!

I am going to write a lot here. For some reasons I really need to write today. It might be because my brain is fucked from shitty meds I have to restrict because a fucking mental health centre ghosted me after making me addicted. I work very hard and very seriously all the time. I dedicate hours creating documents. I do not do it for myself at all. I do it to help my college mates. My work is not finished yet I just sent it to them with an edgy quote: "in case I die before being able to complete it". They were quite amused... Only I know I did not mean this as a joke haha. I am thinking about so many things right now. It hurts me quite a lot to know that I spent my childhood and overall life to the hands of online pedos. Posing for them, doing live shows for them. It started when I was 12 because my life at home was too violent, I was looking like a zombie, at school no student wants to befriend an ugly girl. I only lived online, for a very long time. I knew no affection, no touch and it went on for so long. I met my first meaningful friend when i started highschool. We were so close. Oh boy it felt like a slap to the face when I lost my best friend. I remember I sarted being healthier than I had ever been because I was just acting on automatic mode. I did not want anymore friends in real life. I did not want to talk, to share with anyone else so I pursued my life online. Still no affection, no touch. My best friend was not affectionate and touchy with me. Now what's bothering the hell out of me now, and I will type as if you could read it even if I know it is impossible (otherwise I would not have the balls to write all this). What have you done to me? I was already miserable enough. Why did you play on my lack of experience with affection to play the wolf in sheep disguise? Why did you give me my first "holding hands" experience in your fucking bloody apartment that you used as a piece of art? Why did you make me feel safe there? Why did you hold me? Why did you kiss me? Why did you call me over each time you knew I was wasted? Why did you touch me? Why did you take from me the only thing left I could have experienced happily? Why did you turn it into this nightmare? My first kiss, first time it got sexually physical in person at your apartment that was filled with your fucking blood. Every where. And you shitty "psych" music that made it sound like some kind of drug party. I can't even hate you for what you did. I just feel like an old piece of meat, like a child whose fairytail was destroyed right in front of her eyes. Despite being used to freaks, I was still naive. You have no clue all the hope I had left despite the childhood I had. All the love I felt despite everything I had already lost. I feel terrible, people, I feel terrible. I mean it when I say I have no clue if I won't die this week, if I won't just lose my shit, break down and give up. I've always be very resilient, very strong, I drag myself in the dirt, no hesitation. And I keep working hard to make sure that the day I finally take my own life, then I will have given enough to others not to make their lives too shitty. I live, I work, I stand, I take it all just for you and I have no regrets for doing so. I know I have been a jerk, an asshole, too rough, too cold, too absent. And I am so sorry I didn't know better, but through all of it, to online friends and family, there is no doubt I always loved you dearly.
I think I'll hang myself on Monday.. I have the weekend to make people around me happy. Then I can finally be selfish.

I am sorry to my former best friend too, the most now because all I have is the scarp she gave me. I broke all my belts and I'm too far from a shop to buy any more.

I keep having nightmares in which I'm being very successful at something but it's actually a trap and those who try to trap me want to humiliate me and hit me with hammers.

q. I dressed myself with a mustache for fun and sent pictures to my contacts, asking them if they wanted to date me. One of them said he was engaged and, I was shocked for a moment. I realized how old I was for my mates to be engaged and having families. I realized how much time I spent isolated from everyone. From everything. I never got to live but through abuse and bad news. I realize that's all what my life has been. I am terribly sorry to the people who love me. To the ones who counted on me. I promise I went as far as I could and used all my resistance against my own self. I just can't do it anymore. I know it is a big betrayal, mostly after all I went through to save myself, all the hope I gave. I just can't do this anymore. I am sorry to my former best friend too, the most now because all I have is the scarp she gave me. I broke all my belts and I'm too far from a shop to buy any more.

W. Time is against me, facts are against me, events are against me, people are against me, I'm against my own self. Everything is a disappointment yet I have to be unbreakable. If I was to break anyway, there would be no one to stick back the pieces. I need to disappear and soon I'll have the occasion to do it. All I need is to go back home. My apartment. No one to stop me. All the material I need very easily reachable. The perfect plan. I just need to be patient now. It hurts so much but it is the final steps and now nothing matters anymore.

I just want to hear that I'm loved. He never said the words. It could save me from so much if he did. He doesn't understand that loving doesn't mean being a couple. I love my friends dearly. I tell them. He doesn't say it back. I wish he could say it. When I asked, he avoided answering. I wish he could say it one time before tomorrow. Because I booked a train to go back to my appartement. I packed all the medications I found. I took my money for a nice bottle. I don't think I'll need a ticket to return.

Today reminded me of what I live for. Can't believe yesterday I had set everything up to hang myself and today, just today I was reminded of what actually made me hold on all this years. Creating. I was allowed to go back to college to take exams to be able to pursue till a PhD. When I was sat there, I felt at home... and when I started writing... it was like coming back from the death. Today I feel happy. So happy I wore my favourite outfit and made sure to share my joy around. I feel like I just woke up from some kind of forced hibernation. I feel like myself again ! damn. I got my favourite coffee at the coffee machine. I got to conpose on a piece of paper... I'm so glad I didn't pursue yesterday. Otherwise I wouldn't have felt this joy again. It was worth living for. it is worth surviving for.

I am a despicable person.. When I don't take my meds, I harm others, I harm myself. Deep down I feel like it's just who I am. A nasty person. A narcissist with no compassion. Monday I tried to hang myself because I couldn't bear the situation anymore. I wanted the easy way out to avoid harming any more people and also avoid being harmed by people. When I got down from the chair to hang, for some reason I just couldn't kill myself. It was bit of a mess because I couldn't get back on the chair easily, my legs were shaking too much like I no longer had control on my lower body. I really thought I was going to die and I didn't really mind, it was more a case of " well too bad if I don't get back on that chair in time ". I managed to get back on the chair, it took a hell lot of muscle strength. I did anyway. It deterred me from trying again till today. I feel so miserable and nasty. I just need another way to end things. Maybe a faster way.

It's the risks we take by being public about our abuse. Sadly. I want to end it, every day.

I feel like I'm not fit for life.. I'm just a working machine, no social connections, no real hobby, no purpose. I went back to live in a city after almost a year spent in a house in the wood / countryside where most of my neighbours were my crazy relatives. Seeing all those beautiful people, seeing how lively they are and how much details there have on them, how they talk to each other and hug and share love.... it all make me understand that I'm not able to do any of that. Handling violence ? hell yeah I can. Not feeling a thing in a situation considered traumatic? Hell yeah I can. Have basic communication skill? nope. nope nope. I am a working machine, I'm a punching ball, I'm that weird ass monster that came from the woods... but I'm not a human being. I'm nothing. I'm so unfit for this world while I really wish I could interact. But there is like a never breaking prison all around me and I cannot reach the outside world. Never. I just make everyone uncomfortable. I'm better off dead. you're all better off without me.

Handling violence ? hell yeah I can. Not feeling a thing in a situation considered traumatic? Hell yeah I can. Have basic communication skill? nope. nope nope. I am a working machine, I'm a punching ball, I'm that weird ass monster that came from the woods... but I'm not a human being. I'm nothing. I'm so unfit for this world while I really wish I could interact. But there is like a never breaking prison all around me and I cannot reach the outside world. Never. I just make everyone uncomfortable. I'm better off dead. you're all better off without me.
I want to end everything. I'm really unfit for this world.

I thought I should post my suicide letter here!!. Sorry I was weak. Sorry I couldn’t keep people interested in me. I hate myself as much as anyone else. I understand why none of you reached out to me. I’m mentally ill and I’m sorry that I put it on the people around me it was my bad. At first i was mad that you guys ignored me when I opened up, but ultimately it wasn’t your job to fix me. I don’t expect anyone to be happy, but rest assured that I want cause you issues anymore. Please forget me. I know this is sad but understand that this is what I wanted, at-least you want have to pretend to ignore me anymore. Hopefully you’ll have more time for your real friends. This is the best gift I can give even if it doesn’t seem like it now. I love you all 💕

The next morning you wake up huddled in the corner of your bed with a sore neck and a pounding headache 🤕 so you get out of bed just like any other morning!!

Looped a belt around my neck, placed the end in the doorframe and leaned forward... then I went for a walk. It was so casual. I was getting dressed to go on a date with someone and as I was putting on my pants, I pulled out the belt, looped it around my neck, put the other end in the doorframe, closed the door and leaned forward. I took it off, chuckled and then finished getting ready for my date. It’s just seared into my mind that I’ll take my own life soon. It’s just a matter of time.

failure. just thinking about how if the adults around me as a kid took notice of my obvious mental issues and helped me instead of screaming at me and getting mad at me things could be so much different. i remember when i was like 10? 11? screaming about how much i hate myself and how i wanted to die. i was told i was being dramatic. i remember when i started not attending school. i remember a teacher asking me “why dont you play as much in gym anymore? you used to love it!” i was getting anxious being in that builiding. i remember a teacher telling me i was gonna go nowhere in life if i continue to not come to school. in grade 8. i mean she was right. i did fail in life. i remember grade 9 having a panic attack in the attendance cousellors office because she threatened to call my parents to take me out of the sport i was doing at the time. that sport was the one thing stopping me from killing myself. she yelled at me and told me i was gonna fail in life. i remember when i attempted last year i told the doctors that it hurts so much that i need help. i was released in the morning with a paper saying im depressed. no help. i just needed a place to put these feelings im sorry.. i just cant deal with this anymore ive asked for help for so long and nobody cares.. if im dead maybe they’ll notice.

failure. just thinking about how if the adults around me as a kid took notice of my obvious mental issues and helped me instead of screaming at me and getting mad at me things could be so much different. i remember when i was like 10? 11? screaming about how much i hate myself and how i wanted to die. i was told i was being dramatic. i remember when i started not attending school. i remember a teacher asking me “why dont you play as much in gym anymore? you used to love it!” i was getting anxious being in that builiding. i remember a teacher telling me i was gonna go nowhere in life if i continue to not come to school. in grade 8. i mean she was right. i did fail in life. i remember grade 9 having a panic attack in the attendance cousellors office because she threatened to call my parents to take me out of the sport i was doing at the time. that sport was the one thing stopping me from killing myself. she yelled at me and told me i was gonna fail in life. i remember when i attempted last year i told the doctors that it hurts so much that i need help. i was released in the morning with a paper saying im depressed. no help. i just needed a place to put these feelings im sorry.. i just cant deal with this anymore ive asked for help for so long and nobody cares.. if im dead maybe they’ll notice.

I can never comprehend how people live life by just "going with the flow". I'd love to live my life like that, all the thoughts about the future and how it's not gonna work out worry me. How does the thought of an unknown future not worry you? How do you deal with the fact that the little bit of certainty you have can fall apart so easily? I want to rid my mind of these thoughts and stop living so precariously, but how?

"It gets better" Yeah right. Whenever I tell people how I feel, it's always the same response "It gets better". People have been saying this for years now, WHERE IS THE GOOD PART? IM DONE WAITING, IT HASN'T GOT BETTER. ITS EXACTLY THE SAME AS IT WAS 2-3 YEARS AGO. WHEN?

I had a good day :). Yesterday i was gonna do it. Everything kept piling on and became too overwhelming too quickly I was going to OD but last minute I decided against it. I gave myself 1 more day. now I’m glad I’m here cause today was a good day :) maybe it does get better

What if death is worse?. I’ve always viewed death as a way out or as an escape but what if the afterlife is worse? “If everything goes to shit, suicide is always an option” Everyone around me holds on to life so dearly, is it cause they are also scared of the unknown or because they genuinely want to live? Is our purpose to make the most of this life cause what comes next is worse? We have no way of knowing what happens after, religious people have some sort of security through faith but I just can’t. I want to die so badly and just leave this life behind but I’m so afraid that the other side is going to be worse.

But every time I start contemplating suicide again I look at my dog and I can't do that to him. Who knows, maybe it's one of those "blessings in a disguise" if those are even a thing. He does nothing but love me and it seems so selfish to take that away cause of my own feelings. It's a terrible way to live. Why does living for myself rather than for someone/thing else feel so selfish?

I didn't choose to be here so why do people make it seem like I have an obligation to stay?. I can't do anything right. I can't even get any work done because of my terrible work ethic, how am I supposed to get by in life? The problems I used to push aside for later are problems that I need to deal with now. Procrastination, procrastination, procrastination. I can't help it, I can't get anything done. Why do books/movies/media portray depression as so badly? In every movie that I've watched that talks about depression they make it seem so romanticized. The main character can always channel their feelings into something useful, is it like that for other people? I can't even enjoy the things I used to like because everything seems so small and meaningless now.

I want to live, I tell myself "It will get better" over and over again. But in the back of my mind I know the reality. I'm not going to win this fight. Whether I lose today, tomorrow, or in five years. It's all the same, it's all pointless. I'll just end up dead regardless..

In a mental haze, fading away. Squandering years of education, drowning in student debt. My therapists are taking time off for the holidays. Everyone in my immediate family is dead. In a mental haze, fading away. Squandering years of education, drowning in student debt. My therapists are taking time off for the holidays. Everyone in my immediate family is dead. My friends are home for the holidays and I just left a bad relationship. I'm so fucking lonely and I feel so selfish for admitting it. I'm also feeling myself physically start to fade. I've stopped eating much at all. I used to be so scared of this sinking feeling, but I'm trying to embrace it like a warm blanket. There is nothing else. Thank you for listening... ❤️
My very first semi-conscious thought within seconds of waking up again every single morning is "Why?".. I hate this so much.

I’m the one that makes things awkward or I get angry if something is too loud. I think it has gotten to the point where I need to distance myself for other people’s sake. I cannot keep ruining those around me. I’m seeing it with my own eyes, I’m hurting them. I am far beyond repair. I cannot just simply fix myself at this point. I need to have some empathy for once and do something good and that must be to remove myself from the ones in my life. To my parents I am a disappointment, to my friends I’m angry and mean, and to my past lover I’m manipulative and avoidant. I’m always alone. I’m practically used to it at this point but sometimes it weighs heavy on my heart and I long for love. But I know I am toxic. I’m fire and I burn everything I touch. I’ve watched the happiest most positive people burn down to the most depressed negative individuals all because of me. I changed them. Every conversation I’ve had always had a negative spin to it, because it’s simply how I am. I truly believe it will always be like this. I will just have to learn to deal with it or end it all.

Thoughts Recently. I've been thinking about suicide more seriously recently. Really thinking about how actually meaningless my life is and how I've really set myself up for failure. I'm lazy and I've never done anything meaningful in my life. I never get out of my comfort zone. I have zero interest in friends or anything social beyond my sometimes online interactions which I force myself to make. Every day I think about suicide and how much better it would benefit my family and friends if I just simply didn't exist. I know they are disappointed in me and wish I turned out differently. It's harsh but I really don't care if anyone misses me, if they do at least which I really suspect they won't apart from one person. I don't care if anyone cries or is in pain from my absence. I've lacked empathy for the longest time and it's just how I am, unfortunately. I'm just a weird girl honestly. I hate sex, I hate friendships and relationships. All of that was ruined for me by myself alone. Something I have been thinking about recently is the cost it would take when I either fail my attempt or even succeed. If I fail it's going to give my family a large medical fee and if I die it's that and my funeral cost. I guess I do have some sort of empathy if I'm worried about that. I'm just at a point in my life where I'm unsure if I should keep torturing myself by living or finally let go no matter the repercussions.

I had a dream that I did it. But I failed. What kind of fucking irony is that? I got over my fear of large bodies of water and not being able to swim, I jumped in. I felt so good, drowning never felt so good. But I woke up on the shore, rising out of the waves now calm. I think about dying all the time. I make jokes about it all the time, but no one knows I'm serious. I know I'm not supposed to be here, everything about my existence went wrong (wrong people getting unexpectedly pregnant, not making it to the hospital for my birth, my name being misspelled on my birth certificate). Why can't I just not be here?

"Think about your poor parents! You'll be wasting all the time and effort they put into your life if you kill yourself!! How selfish and ungrateful!". I didn't ask to fucking be here. I didn't ask to be traumatized and abused by them. I didn't ask to be bullied most of my school life. I didn't ask to constantly feel like an outcast. I didn't ask to constantly be alone. I didn't ask to never get the help I needed. I didn't ask to be subject to middle child syndrome. I didn't ask to constantly drown in pain and agony day in, day out. I didn't ask. I didn't ask. I didn't ask. I didn't ask. I didn't ask. I didn't ask. I didn't ask. I didn't ask.

Killing myself would actually be correcting a huge mistake. Everything about my existence and coming into this world went wrong. Let's see: \-I wasn't planned \-I wasn't wanted \-My name was legally misspelled and no one ever bothered to fix it \-I was born at home and early \-Genetics royally fucked my face \-I inherited learning disabilities so I'm not smart either \-All I do is take space and suck up resources that also need to go to my younger siblings \-Wasn't raised very well with the added bonus of Middle Child Syndrome So, yeah. I'm just one big mistake that needs to be erased. Either I was supposed to be someone else or just not exist at all. All I think about is who I could have been if I were just anyone else.

Most days, I feel like I'm standing in a room screaming as loud as I can for help, for a rest from life, for a break, for SOMETHING good or SOMEONE good- but the walls are soundproof.. it doesn't matter what i do nothing matters there's only one way out now
I will constantly post positive things aimed at others on my blog that remind them that they're good and everything will be okay.. I just believe everyone else's life is far more valuable than mine.
i don't want to be remembered when I die. I want to be forgotten. To be as though I never existed in the first place.

I think I'm just going to spend the rest of the time I'm giving myself on this planet to help and uplift whoever needs it. I am a lost cause. The light inside of me is dead. I don't think I could ever feel better. So, whatever energy I have and whatever I have left to give, I'm just going to give it to others. They can make it, they have potential- I don't. They want a friend? I'm there. They need someone to talk to? I'm all ears. They make something? Compliment city over here. Someone asking for advice? I'm going to give the best I can. Recently, someone found out that I was a friend of their friend. They asked me to take care of her since she's going through it. No one has ever taken care of me or has even said that about me but still, I don't mind it. She deserves it and I guess I don't. That's fine, I've made my peace with that. It's the least I can do and maybe I won't feel so shitty when I kill myself. At least I can say I did some good things.
