I think my mom knows that the end is near. She will have these bouts where she becomes very affectionate with me and she constantly has me promise to her that I won't kill myself and I'll thrive. She's been doing this since I turned 20. It's not news to her that I want to die. I'm 21 and I'm pretty sure my end date will be once I turn 25. I tell her I will live on, but even I know that's a lie. Even if I decided to be crazy enough to try to thrive, I know that will only make the descent go faster. Life has been like falling in slow mo, there's no hero, no parachute, no grabbing onto anything; just me, the sky, and the ground. Nothing to do but wait. But now, I'm not staring at clouds become farther and farther from me, I've flipped over, and I'm watching the ground become closer.

I think living- REAL living -is for the rare and the lucky.. That happy go lucky, that confidence, that 'never thought of killing myself' life. You know what I'm talking about. The kind of happy that isn't chemically created in a lab and then delivered by a pharmacy. The trying and success, the contentment even. To have lovers, to have money, to have real raw talent, passion, to not be stuck living at home at 21 in a major you're not sure you even want, getting nauseous at the mere thought of waking up tomorrow. That's real living. And I was not rare nor lucky.

I'm addicted to watching and rewatching kids movies/shows. Mainly the ones I watched as a kid ranging from old Pixar to the original Muppet Show on VHS. I hate all of the new shit that came well into the 2010's because it's just a bunch of bright colors that hurt my eyes and the most annoying songs/sounds that are way too loud. It's obvious that cartoons are more about money than good storytelling these days. My only exception is Amazing World of Gumball. I'm 21 and I started rewatching them when I was 18 which was when the deep suicidal thoughts started. It was when I had a terrible fight with my mom about our relationship and the way she was treating me which she didn't handle well. The way she acted in response to that fight was so irrational and she did things on purpose to hurt me. It triggered suicidal thoughts that I buried for years upon years to come back with a raging vengeance. I called the suicidal hotline twice while she called my therapist to complain about me. She never knew I was contemplating suicide. These kids movies and tv shows I have watched so often because for ninety minutes, I feel like a kid again who has nothing to worry about, the kid who was depressed but too distracted to remember that I was. I feel like I have some of my innocence back. For ninety minutes I don't think about killing myself, using my eyebrow razor to scrap my ankles, or how much I dread waking up tomorrow. For ninety minutes, I don't care about anything accept for the world in my screen. I am aware, yes, but if a movie doesn't distract me enough, I'll pretend. Can you tell I'm desperate?

I think living- REAL living -is for the rare and the lucky.. That happy go lucky, that confidence, that 'never thought of killing myself' life. You know what I'm talking about. That's real living. And I was not rare nor lucky.

I'm addicted to watching and rewatching kids movies/shows. Mainly the ones I watched as a kid ranging from old Pixar to the original Muppet Show on VHS. I hate all of the new shit that came well into the 2010's because it's just a bunch of bright colors that hurt my eyes and the most annoying songs/sounds that are way too loud. It's obvious that cartoons are more about money than good storytelling these days. My only exception is Amazing World of Gumball. I'm 21 and I started rewatching them when I was 18 which was when the deep suicidal thoughts started. It was when I had a terrible fight with my mom about our relationship and the way she was treating me which she didn't handle well. The way she acted in response to that fight was so irrational and she did things on purpose to hurt me. It triggered suicidal thoughts that I buried for years upon years to come back with a raging vengeance. I called the suicidal hotline twice while she called my therapist to complain about me. She never knew I was contemplating suicide. These kids movies and tv shows I have watched so often because for ninety minutes, I feel like a kid again who has nothing to worry about, the kid who was depressed but too distracted to remember that I was. I feel like I have some of my innocence back. For ninety minutes I don't think about killing myself, using my eyebrow razor to scrap my ankles, or how much I dread waking up tomorrow. For ninety minutes, I don't care about anything accept for the world in my screen. I am aware, yes, but if a movie doesn't distract me enough, I'll pretend. Can you tell I'm desperate?

I wish I was first. Maybe this is the loneliness and middle child syndrome talking, but I wish I was the first choice, thought about first, put first in someone else's head. Hell, I wish someone would even think about me. I wish someone would stick up for me, would be willing to go to bat for me- I just want one person other than myself to have my back. My uncle is a piece of shit. I caught him snooping in my parents' bedroom and he not only deeply insulted me but he tried to tell my family that he was trying to stop me from stealing drugs from my mother (which wasn't true and nobody believed him). I told my family that although the relationship between myself and my uncle is destroyed, it shouldn't affect their relationship with him. And while I know this is super contradictory and I don't have the right to be mad, I just wish my family had've taken it upon themselves to also treat my uncle coldly as I am. It feels as though they have forgotten what transpired already. And then they wonder why I think no one cares about me.

Can I tell my therapist that I will kill myself in four years?. Honestly, I'm just going to therapy to put my mom at ease. She thinks it'll magically fix me and I let her think that. She doesn't know that I'm killing myself at 25. I guess she'll know on November 30th, 2024. But, could I say this to a therapist without it being broadcasted to my folks and landing me in a psych ward?

My Perfect Last Day. If I had all the money in the world, this is how I’d plan my last day of life. I would have my hair and makeup professionally done. Then I’d wear a flowy dress and a flower crown. I would hire an escort to pretend like we were married from sun up to just before my death. All of my romantic firsts done in one day. We’d have a picnic by the lake, I’d buy them flowers. When we split ways, we’ll say “see you at home”. After that, I’d take some drugs I bought that would coax me into a soft but inevitable goodnight. I’d wait for the effects to take, listening to “Clair de Lune” because I’m a basic bitch. I would then walk to the lake and let myself fall in. As I drown, I look up to see the distorted lights of the city and the night sky through the water until I couldn’t keep my eyes open anymore. My life would have never known fulfillment and contentment until that day.

Motions. Grind, grind, grind. That is all my life is. School, homework (that i usually skip), videogames, sleep, repeat. My life is going nowhere. I am somewhat outgoing, so i can hide the pain. Noone has any idea that i am suffering. This is killing me, if it doesnt, i will. Kind words or directions dont faze me. I have tried finding answers on google, to no avail. I have only sunk deeper into self hatred/pity. People seem to victimize suicidal people. They seem to attack me, telling me why i, a free thinking individual, should not take MY own life. I am stuck going through the motions. Wake up early, Contemplate, Drag through the day, Get home, Contemplate, Play videogames, Contemplate, 'Me time', Contemplate, Listen to music, Contemplate, Fall asleep late. Repeat I am good at everything, but great at nothing. I can half-ass my way through honors classes. I have no sense of direction. My 'friends' hate me. My parents dont care enough to inquire. My self respect is gone. I once cared and tried. I have been raised on incentives, but they seem to have disappeared. I no longer care enough to try. I do things that drive me deeper into my crisis. I hang out with the druggies and those who dont care, as well. I have little to no social life, let alone a chance to have kids, which seems to be a major point in all if these '10 reasons not to kill yourself' lists. My dispair is unending. I see no end to my futile grind Grind grind grind, till the day i die, which i hope is soon. This is not a call for hope, This is not a plead for attention, But a post of my thoughts, Maybe my last Do not be suprised if you dont hear from me

I just want it to end. I dont get it Why am i blessed, but cursed Why do i have spirit, but no drive Why do i care with nothing to care about I am torn in every aspect Physically Mentally Psycologically I have the potential, but no motovation I think that i could be smart, but i am hampered by my secret depression, and brash outbursts I think about myself. I am useless I am a dick to those around me I push them down I have no purpose other than to cause hatred I hate my family, friends, teachers They burden me in more ways than they could ever know I seek the moment at all times I wish i could always be in a high, escaping the crumbling life around me I will amount to nothing I fake joy so easily, i trick myself. Its so easy to trick your so-callled loved ones They have no reason to notice I dont want to live, Is that all to much to ask for? What could the words of someone i will never know do? Theres no way to prove anyone cares for me I want to end it all, nothing bad can come of it.

Fuck. I have everything a highschooler could want; a car, a job, money, friends, smarts. Im not trying, and i dont need to. I sleep through my math class and somehow not failing. I dont do homework, mostly because i would rather do something i feel is progressive, like make money. I need to feel tangible results. So i usually stay up past 12:00 playing games, looking at my phone, and listening to music as i slowly fade out of conciousness. Then i wake up at 6:00, think about the homework i should have done, drive to school, almost nodding out while i drive. As soon as classes start, i regret not doing my work, somehow do OK on the tests, then go to work after school. As soon as i get home, i try to squeeze every ounce of fun out of the rest of my day, and the cycle continues. I float on thru life, and i know i wont be able to soon. I know i will kill myself before senior year ends. I cant take the monotony and predictability of it all. I cant take the pressures of life in the future. I have been unintentionally setting myself up for failure and i will prolly quit before that happens. On a different note, one of my friends has been prescribed "happy" pills. I cant tell if he is using them as an excuse to be an asshole, or has just completely changed because of them. He seems so distant now. I want some of that shit, but that is beside the point. How do i deal with him? Do i support him, even though i got shit on my plate?

God gave me brains but I just don’t know how to use them correctly. And everyone at school was asking me what I where i was going to college. Heh, I’d never make it in college. I hate school. I hated getting up in the morning just to sleep in all of my classes. It’s not like I was trying to, though. Every class, barring a very select few, bored me so much I just did the bare minimum and fell asleep. Nothing interests me anymore. I just want to smoke and fuck around with my friends. The opportunities for that are becoming few and far between so I don’t really enjoy life anymore. Maybe if I found love it would make life better, but I don’t even want that. I fuck up every chance I have so I just can’t even try anymore. I never want to hurt anyone, but somehow I always do. If I wasn’t here, I couldn’t hurt anyone ever again. I just wish it will be quick and painless

I’m lost. Patiently, I wander aimlessly Hoping to find something, but what? Unknowing for what I seek, so why do it? Is it a reason? Am I searching for a reason? A reason for my search? How deep. What keeps me going if I can sleep and dream? Dream for something just out of my reach Dream for something other than what I seek A life other than my own, with its own reason for being For me, the search is growing more tiring Maybe if I had a different reason, I’d find it sooner Be complete for a change, knowing my purpose But for now I lie, lying both awake and to myself A lie about what I want, my reason for continuing the search I want something that isn’t possible to grasp, I want to do whatever I want, whenever I want A childish reason, for sure. I’ll never find what I truly want, so why keep searching? Now I search for a way to end my search, how deep. A gun could end it in a flash, maybe I’ll find one After the flash I won’t have to search, Maybe I can just lie, lie to pass the time To myself, or just to rest? Only I will know what’s next

A trainwreck. Where does the time go? Lost on worrying or not caring Spent on graduating or what comes after Wasted on her or partying with friends Where did the hours of studying go? School has been one big blur I can’t remember anything I’ve learned It’s all been ruined by this last year Slacking off, jacking off, packing the bong Shit don’t matter when I start to fade Forget about my problems for the rest of the day No cares, no worries, fuck, I’m content No plans, no future in sight “You got a 32 on the ACT, right?” Most I’m doin is a 2 year degree Just a waste of potential, fuck you, me No will to live, no reason to continue No aspirations, no love to give Born to be a disappointment For whom none will grieve

If only I never left my dreams (rant/tangents warning). Most of me wants to stay in my dreams when I start to wake up. I just want to sleep for the rest of my life. I have no worries when I’m dreaming and that’s all I ever want in life. At my core I’m just a kid who’s worried about everything, but I don’t let anybody see that part of me. I’m good at masking my emotions so nobody worries about me. I just want to live by myself without interacting with anyone. Free from obligations and responsibilities that come from other people. I want to sit alone with my thoughts because I’m tired of wearing a facade for everyone else to like me. I play up the fucked up parts of me for my friends, I suppress those parts when I’m with my family, and I’m loopy and forgetful at my job and in public. I hate putting on these personas, I just want to be my boring self till the day I eventually kick the bucket.

Fuck all of you: I'm worthy of self-respect and I won't stand as your bitch; I'll fight for that or die trying by the hand of the demons of self-loathing evolution vested control over to you by way of us evolving as a social species, needing group approval to survive. Humans need room to breathe and self-improve as inextricably theirs that society does not give them.

If I get rescinded from my college, my one shot for a good life, because of my depression this year, I AM going to kill myself. For some reason just saying that assuages my anxiety. I'm not afraid to die. I'm just living because I want to right now, and I obviously have no obligation to do anything in a universe for which the fruits of my labor is rewarded with the heat death of the universe regardless; so it wouldn't matter anyway. I could just choose of my own accord that, since I will live the rest of my life with my parents, never making anything of myself like I could have, at a DRASTICALLY lower standard of living than I could have if not for my carelessness, I shall enter the same nonexistence I was fine with for all the time before I was born. It will have been my choice and I'm ok with that. This is my contingency plan, and none of your self-righteous fucks can tell me there is anything objectively wrong with that; get over yourselves. Death is ok; the only reason for me to live is if I want to and that is my choice. Now that I have a contingency plan and thereby nothing to fear, it is much easier to get off to work because I certainly want to live and labor as of right now, and that is my choice. But now I have established I have nothing to fear either way — we're all going to die anyway.

I keep expecting life to be more than it is. And I can't just notice that and move on, but I have to exert effort to apply that to each time that presumption perniciously makes its way into my mind without me noticing at first. On the plus side of realizing it isn't, though, I'm really not afraid of anything. It's all tame, and ok.

Sick of trusting people. Sick of false hope. Sick of life. Title speaks for itself. I am so sick of opening myself up to people who don’t care. Sick actually feeling like life will get better only for me to realize that everything was a lie. Life is miserable and no one cares. Literally no one. People only seem to are about what they have when they lose it. I’ll be gone. Fuck this life. Just gonna spend tomorrow packing and shit. This is life apparently. Can’t do this much longer

This is kinda fucked but at this point part of me wants to kill myself for the sake of spiting others. I have been a suicidal person for a while. I have had multiple suicide attempts. I’m a miserable and lonely person. I don’t enjoy life. Every day I wake up and just feel upset because I don’t want to be around for ANOTHER day. I’ve opened up to people before, and they all act repulsed...disgusted. I’ve been called a freak and a monster. People have told me I’m a threat for society and I belong in a padded cell. Why? Because I’m depressed. Because I’ve tried to kill myself. No one understands mental health. They look at someone who’s struggling and just think “what a broken piece of shit”. There is such a stigma against people with mental health struggles...as if we deserve nothing more than to be test subjects and to be locked up for the rest of our lives. They don’t see the trauma, the pain, and the suffering of merely existing. They are incapable of understanding because they don’t want to understand. They don’t want to think about it because it’s “hard”. So many people have turned their backs on me...treated me like shit...told me to “stay the fuck away”. I’ve wanted to kill myself for so long but suddenly now the perspective has changed a little bit. I don’t want to just kill myself because I hate my life and am miserable, but also to spite the people who have treated me like shit. People don’t give a shit until it’s too late. I want to die and then maybe have all those people go “oh....he actually was struggling”. “Maybe I could have done something more”. I want to hurt other people. I want them to feel guilt. I want them to suffer and pay the price of all the suffering they have caused me. From friends to colleagues to my own family members. They all don’t give a shit about my well-being simply as long as I’m alive. That’s the bare standard. At the same time though... I know how little people don’t care. I know my dad will just merrily skip away to the bank to cash out his life insurance check. I told him to raise my policy. He didn’t ask why. He knows my previous suicide attempts. He did it with no hesitation. I’m going to die and no one will bat an eye. I’m serious too. I have no friends. No family. I’m in so much pain and no one cares and it feels like death is the only way to ever convey how much I suffered. People only seem to care once you’re gone. You only realize what you have when you don’t have it anymore. So maybe (hopefully) my death will cause pain. Cause awareness for mental illness. That would be a dream. But also being realistic with myself, no one will care and if anyone’s sad they’ll move on with their lives. I already don’t get any phone calls or texts. Never am I invited to family gatherings on the holidays...in fact I’ve been told specifically not to go. I just want to die. I am ready to die. I am ready to fade into oblivion and leave this life forever and bathe in absolute darkness for the rest of eternity. Only then will I no longer feel this pain that I feel.

I am about to be homeless. If I don’t get this job I will kill myself. Title speaks for itself. I have spent months preparing to get a truck driving job. This has been a dream of mine for years and I have merely been waiting until my 21st birthday to be eligible to apply. This job is meant to be my escape from poverty and would finally give me a life worth living. I have struggled for so so long and worked so hard and it all may be screwed over because I smoked weed two months ago and that shit is STILL in my system. I have to do a drug test in the next 12 days, I have been living a healthy lifestyle and just doing my best to set myself up to hit the ground running with this job, but everything feels so uncertain. I have been testing myself at home. I got my urine below the threshold to pass, but now I’m testing positive again. This is the universe purely just trying to fuck me over. I don’t know if the time I have is enough time to be clean enough for the DOT drug test but it literally feels like my entire livelihood is on the line. I have no friends. I have no family. I have (almost) no money. I am going to be homeless next week. Literally everything I have in life is riding on me getting this driving job. I am afraid because I have no control over this. I have dreams every night and I spend all day struggling to muster any focus on anything other than my own fear of failing this drug test. If I fail this drug test, I will have absolutely nothing. I will kill myself. I am staring down such an intimidating barrel. I have FOUGHT tooth and nail and scraped my way to survive this long and get this far in life, and now I have no control. Now I am just in the fate of my own body’s detoxification system. For all I know, this could’ve the death of me. I don’t want to die, but I am close to the end of my rope. If this all fails, this will literally be the end of me.

Job and life wearing me down. I am currently struggling. For a while I was really bad, then had a good patch, and am now watching myself begin to tumble back down into my depression. I am training right now to be a truck driver, finally thought this was going to be the change I needed in life to make things better, but now here I am once again with suicide on the front of my mind every day as I drive around the country. It’s literally all I think about for hours, and at this point I just really don’t want to be here. Everything I do in life— I am miserable. All I do is run from my pain and it never works. Now I’m locked into a job that is extremely stressful and I’m stuck with a trainer who is a constant negative strain on me. I only have a few more weeks with him, but idk how long I can last. Part of me just wants to kill myself one night after we park at a truck stop or something. However I don’t want to scar my trainer, so that’s conflicting. I have no friends, family, or anywhere to call home so it’s not like I really have anything or anyone to live for. I am in such a dangerous position in life right now and I don’t know how much I can take or how much longer I can last.

The thought of mortality is beginning to interfere with my ability to work. I drive for a living. Semi trucks. I am planning on killing myself this upcoming weekend as it’ll be my first time home in the last 3 weeks and I can’t keep going anymore. Today when driving though, most my thoughts were focused on death, suicide, and my methods/plans. Due to that though, I kept screwing up and missing turns, interchanges, and making careless mistakes. Our trucks have a lot of computers, so my dispatch called me and asked if I was alright and pointed out I’m driving a lot sloppier than usual. I said I’m alright and it wouldn’t happen again. I’m now at a truck stop. I still have 3 days of driving before I am home, but I’m so overwhelmed and miserable. I don’t know how I can last 3 more days in my current state. All that keeps me going is knowing I can shoot myself once I get home. What the fuck. I can barely hold my head up anymore.

I’ve opened up to people before, and they all act repulsed...disgusted. I’ve been called a freak and a monster. People have told me I’m a threat for society and I belong in a padded cell. Why? Because I’m depressed. Because I’ve tried to kill myself. No one understands mental health. They look at someone who’s struggling and just think “what a broken piece of shit”. There is such a stigma against people with mental health struggles...as if we deserve nothing more than to be test subjects and to be locked up for the rest of our lives. They don’t see the trauma, the pain, and the suffering of merely existing. They are incapable of understanding because they don’t want to understand. They don’t want to think about it because it’s “hard”. So many people have turned their backs on me...treated me like shit...told me to “stay the fuck away”. I’ve wanted to kill myself for so long but suddenly now the perspective has changed a little bit. I don’t want to just kill myself because I hate my life and am miserable, but also to spite the people who have treated me like shit. People don’t give a shit until it’s too late. I want to die and then maybe have all those people go “oh....he actually was struggling”. “Maybe I could have done something more”. I want to hurt other people. I want them to feel guilt. I want them to suffer and pay the price of all the suffering they have caused me. From friends to colleagues to my own family members. They all don’t give a shit about my well-being simply as long as I’m alive. That’s the bare standard. At the same time though... I know how little people don’t care. I know my dad will just merrily skip away to the bank to cash out his life insurance check. I told him to raise my policy. He didn’t ask why. He knows my previous suicide attempts. He did it with no hesitation. I’m going to die and no one will bat an eye. I’m serious too. I have no friends. No family. I’m in so much pain and no one cares and it feels like death is the only way to ever convey how much I suffered. People only seem to care once you’re gone. You only realize what you have when you don’t have it anymore. So maybe (hopefully) my death will cause pain. Cause awareness for mental illness. That would be a dream. But also being realistic with myself, no one will care and if anyone’s sad they’ll move on with their lives. I already don’t get any phone calls or texts. Never am I invited to family gatherings on the holidays...in fact I’ve been told specifically not to go. I just want to die. I am ready to die. I am ready to fade into oblivion and leave this life forever and bathe in absolute darkness for the rest of eternity. Only then will I no longer feel this pain that I feel.

I am about to be homeless. If I don’t get this job I will kill myself. Title speaks for itself. I have spent months preparing to get a truck driving job. This has been a dream of mine for years and I have merely been waiting until my 21st birthday to be eligible to apply. This job is meant to be my escape from poverty and would finally give me a life worth living. I have struggled for so so long and worked so hard and it all may be screwed over because I smoked weed two months ago and that shit is STILL in my system. I have to do a drug test in the next 12 days, I have been living a healthy lifestyle and just doing my best to set myself up to hit the ground running with this job, but everything feels so uncertain. I have been testing myself at home. I got my urine below the threshold to pass, but now I’m testing positive again. This is the universe purely just trying to fuck me over. I don’t know if the time I have is enough time to be clean enough for the DOT drug test but it literally feels like my entire livelihood is on the line. I have no friends. I have no family. I have (almost) no money. I am going to be homeless next week. Literally everything I have in life is riding on me getting this driving job. I am afraid because I have no control over this. I have dreams every night and I spend all day struggling to muster any focus on anything other than my own fear of failing this drug test. If I fail this drug test, I will have absolutely nothing. I will kill myself. I am staring down such an intimidating barrel. I have FOUGHT tooth and nail and scraped my way to survive this long and get this far in life, and now I have no control. Now I am just in the fate of my own body’s detoxification system. For all I know, this could’ve the death of me. I don’t want to die, but I am close to the end of my rope. If this all fails, this will literally be the end of me.

Job and life wearing me down. I am currently struggling. For a while I was really bad, then had a good patch, and am now watching myself begin to tumble back down into my depression. I am training right now to be a truck driver, finally thought this was going to be the change I needed in life to make things better, but now here I am once again with suicide on the front of my mind every day as I drive around the country. It’s literally all I think about for hours, and at this point I just really don’t want to be here. Everything I do in life— I am miserable. All I do is run from my pain and it never works. Now I’m locked into a job that is extremely stressful and I’m stuck with a trainer who is a constant negative strain on me. I only have a few more weeks with him, but idk how long I can last. Part of me just wants to kill myself one night after we park at a truck stop or something. However I don’t want to scar my trainer, so that’s conflicting. I have no friends, family, or anywhere to call home so it’s not like I really have anything or anyone to live for. I am in such a dangerous position in life right now and I don’t know how much I can take or how much longer I can last.

The thought of mortality is beginning to interfere with my ability to work. I drive for a living. Semi trucks. I am planning on killing myself this upcoming weekend as it’ll be my first time home in the last 3 weeks and I can’t keep going anymore. Today when driving though, most my thoughts were focused on death, suicide, and my methods/plans. Due to that though, I kept screwing up and missing turns, interchanges, and making careless mistakes. Our trucks have a lot of computers, so my dispatch called me and asked if I was alright and pointed out I’m driving a lot sloppier than usual. I said I’m alright and it wouldn’t happen again. I’m now at a truck stop. I still have 3 days of driving before I am home, but I’m so overwhelmed and miserable. I don’t know how I can last 3 more days in my current state. All that keeps me going is knowing I can shoot myself once I get home. What the fuck. I can barely hold my head up anymore.

Depression is like a mental cancer. Depression is like a mental cancer. All with different stages that can span many years of a persons life. Some people manage to beat depression, while others do not and usually succumb to it via suicide. I feel like I have watched myself slowly descend deeper and deeper into the pit of depression over many years of my life. At first it was manageable and I was still able to go about my life. Things got harder and harder and my depression grew and became more debilitating. My sense of identity diminishing as I became less of myself and more of just an embodiment of my own depression. Stage IV is the stage where it’s hardest to overcome. Suicidal thoughts run rampant. The suicidal thoughts grow and keep growing and slowly become what your mind is fixated on. At this point in my life I know my fate will be suicide. I know this is what I’ll succumb to. My mind cannot keep going, it cannot keep enduring. This cancer of depression has spread and taken over my head. Some people get lucky, I am not. Suicide is not a matter of if— but when. Soon people will realize how much pain I have been and continue to be in. But that will be too late. Such is life.

People don’t trust me purely because I went to a mental hospital before. Feeling like I should have just killed myself back then when I had the chance. Title speaks for itself. For years a close friend and I have been working on getting a house. He ended up having a child with his girlfriend and now they’re married, but it was all planned that she would come along and be in our house when we got it. Well, plans changed and my friend’s wife’s parents talked my friends wife out of it and used me as an excuse saying that I’m not safe to be around because I went to the mental hospital in the past. They said I’m dangerous and I’ll end up killing everyone including the kid. They say that, and then say how my firiend isn’t ready to buy a house, but then forces him on a loan application to buy a house with the in-laws. So now, I’m not gonna have a home, my friend is locked in with his in-laws, his in-laws have taken total control of my friends marriage and now won’t let me anywhere close to the house. Knowing this is how people feel about me (and multiple parties— at that) it just brings me down. Ever since I went to the mental hospital, I’ve been treated like shit by so many people. I’ve been called a monster, a demon, a threat to society. All because I couldn’t handle my emotions anymore. I wish I could talk to my friends in-law to their face and tell them to tell me I should have killed back then. Honestly I believe it though. I should have just killed myself back then. It’s evident the world would have been better off without me, since people are so annoyed by my existence. Jokes on them. I’m gonna kill myself and make sure people know so they can celebrate my death. I hate this world, and here’s another reason. The world has turned its back on me, and now I turn my back on the world. This is the end.

Maybe something will happen and I’ll bother to stick around, but that doesn’t seem likely. August 4. The end.

No words. People are cruel.. I remember this quote that goes, "there's bravery in being kind." And it made me realize how people are just mean-spirited because they set up defense mechanisms to not hurt themselves. Lately, I've become more sensitive. It's probably because I've been living in my room since I graduated. Which would be six years, now. I haven't vc-d with anyone for weeks. Haven't made new friends online for months. I just want to feel like I have someone, you know? I don't know why I'm crying. It's like, every time I open up, i'm setting myself up to getting hurt. and every time i start something, i'm setting myself up for failure. i don't know what to do anymore. I'm already having a hard time up here in my brain can poverty not add up to it. Maybe if i wasn't dumb and capable enough, i would have memorized the hangman's noose, already. just sucks, really. i'm so, so tired.

i lost like four teeth for being depressed.. because i don't brush my teeth. i'm surprised i'm even showering again but that's probably because of the heat. i'm sorry for posting here again. it really seems like i don't have anyone, huh? the truth is, i've been a hikki for maybe six years now? since i graduated. then there's covid and i'm jobless. the agoraphobia is kicking at a high speed. it's a sunday and I'm just rotting here. for no particular reason except for the fact that i am sad and i don't have the energy to plan my own suicide, which is— really complicated to succeed in, lemme tell you. maybe i'm grieving. yeah, i'm grieving for all the people who died this year in just two months. maybe i don't want to be alive for the next one. i already know i have a fragile mind, i won't be able to handle it. what do you actually do when you're at the bottom of the barrel and you're consumed with despair? i always thought i'd kill myself out of spite and anger for those who's hurt me but i just have feelings of defeat, acceptance and frustration. the acceptance of defeat is knowing I lost. the frustrating is knowing if i really wanted to end myself. i've done it a long time ago.
my chronic illness came back tenfold and i can't even get out of bed, i feel useless. my life is a waste of space.. being disabled sucks. should have offer my self when i had the capacity to.
I'm happy to have loved. I'm content. The memories I've made with everyone, will you promise to keep them dearly?

It’s been 5 months. And every day of those 5 months have been me just trying to not feel shitty. It’s been 5 months and I still feel shitty.

I wish I was dead. I have to go back to school on the 24th. I remember always being really excited for school to start because the summers would be boring. Now I’m dreading going back to school. I’m not ready. I thought that by August I would be doing fine again, but it’s still an uphill battle. I feel like I’m in the same place I was in March. It sucks when so much time has passed but you feel like you’ve made no progress. It feels like I’m a failure for not getting better. I’m mad at myself for it. I talk to maybe 6-8 people consistently. We play games, talk, and hang out occasionally. I don’t feel comfortable opening up to them or sharing how I really feel. When I cry I always tell myself that I should call someone and that I’m never going to get better if I don’t reach out to someone. But then I realize that there is nobody to call. I would rather not call anybody than call someone who doesn’t really care.
I want to matter to someone again.

I think that killing myself is really the only way to stop feeling like this. For the last few months I’ve felt like I’ve been living in this metal box of emptiness and numbness. Nothing I do is ever good enough to make me feel better in the long run. I cry at night even after having a good day. I still feel like shit even when I practice healthy habits and behaviors. Hobbies and friends only make me feel better for so long until I find myself back where I started. It’s like my mind rejects any feelings of long-term happiness or content. Now that school has started it feels like the walls are closing in on me. I don’t know what to do anymore. I already tried my best

Strangers, again. Does anyone else have their “person”? The person that you think if you were able to talk to them the way you used to that everything would finally feel okay, that all the pieces would finally fit together, and that the fires around you would finally burn out. If only you could mean something to this person again. I get mad at myself a lot for missing this person. I think it’s stupid to miss someone who doesn’t care about you anymore. But then I can’t help but think how nice it would feel it they still did. If they still wondered how your day was going and what you were up to. But I guess it’s kind of pointless to think about that kind of stuff. I don’t know why I feel this way. We were not even close for that long in comparison to my other friendships. But I really liked this person. I still think he is one of the funniest people I know. He can also be very kind and thoughtful, just not towards me anymore. He’s charming and silly at the same time. Sometimes when I feel lonely I imagine myself being able to talk to him again. I imagine sitting next to him in that hallway and talking to him about whatever was on my mind, him listening intently. It hurts really bad when I think about how he’s probably just getting on with his life while I’ve been wandering around aimlessly trying to put myself back together. Sometimes I wonder if I really meant anything to him. I think that’s just the worst, getting hung up on someone who could shrug me off as just an trivial part of their past year. Now I see him around and all I see is someone who wouldn’t even look in my direction. Strangers, again.

If only you could mean something to this person again. I get mad at myself a lot for missing this person. I think it’s stupid to miss someone who doesn’t care about you anymore. But then I can’t help but think how nice it would feel it they still did. If they still wondered how your day was going and what you were up to. But I guess it’s kind of pointless to think about that kind of stuff. I don’t know why I feel this way. We were not even close for that long in comparison to my other friendships. But I really liked this person. I still think he is one of the funniest people I know. He can also be very kind and thoughtful, just not towards me anymore. He’s charming and silly at the same time. Sometimes when I feel lonely I imagine myself being able to talk to him again. I imagine sitting next to him in that hallway and talking to him about whatever was on my mind, him listening intently. It hurts really bad when I think about how he’s probably just getting on with his life while I’ve been wandering around aimlessly trying to put myself back together. Sometimes I wonder if I really meant anything to him. I think that’s just the worst, getting hung up on someone who could shrug me off as just an trivial part of their past year. Now I see him around and all I see is someone who wouldn’t even look in my direction. Strangers, again.

At this point I am just a schoolwork machine. I barely get any sleep, and when I do, it’s during my classes. I stay up late to get work done, and when I finally go to bed, I can’t sleep. I can never sleep when I really need to, only when it’s the most inconvenient for me. It’s so fucked up but I can’t even fix my sleep schedule because I have so much work to do and other responsibilities to take care of. I haven’t gotten a break since the year started. Fucking teachers who assign a different assignment, essay, or thing every class and then my English teacher who has us do a reading quiz almost every class. My classes are so fucking boring it drives me through the wall. All my teachers talk in this same slow, monotonous cadence that makes me want to blow my brains out. Everyone takes too long to get to the point and I’m just sitting there not knowi what the fuck I’m supposed to get out it. I barely have any friends in these classes either. I lay in bed every night with shitty thoughts because I can’t stand the silence and I don’t know how to fall asleep. I get pissed off at myself and then at everyone else and then at myself again for being angry. I am so tired
I wish I didn't feel like a useless piece of shit all the time.
I wish someone was proud of me.
How do u cope with knowing you will never get the apology or closure u need.

I've totally given up on myself.. I despise everything about myself. I'm a zero. A nobody. I just absolutely hate myself. At my best all I am is somebody who cannot do anything correctly. And at my worst I'm someone who is insensitive and hurtful. I've given up on most things. I just don't have a need to do anything, don't have a need to wake up in the morning. Don't have a need to get a job, etc. I don't like anything, everything in the world is a chore and not worth doing. I cannot stand being myself. Everytime look in the mirror, I cringe. I don't have any attribute that I find attractive in any way inside or out. I'm 100% sure I will stay single until I die. I'm unlovable and uninteresting as a person. I have no good qualities nor any talents or skills and no matter what I do to try and develop any certain skill I'm always the same fucking embarrassingly worthless person I've been since birth. I wish I could've never been alive, I never asked to be born so my parents should've thought twice and used a condom. Or better yet abort my ass. Kill me before I can retain memories. I'd kill someone to get the chance to never exist at all.

I'm seriously considering hanging myself in the next few hours. I just don't want anything to do with my life. Its my decision anyway. My life is mine to take. I'm not going to stay alive just because people will be sad. Its selfish for people to force people to stay alive for that reason. I truly believe that there should be a medical option to kill yourself through lethal injection if you want. Everybody is alive against their own will, therefore I should be able to just end it whenever I want without people stopping me. I don't care about how broken you will be or if you have to clean my body up after. I couldn't give a single shit. I just don't necessarily think life is for me. I don't want to put in effort for anything nor do I want to work. I don't want to do the things that you are obligated to do within this world. And the things that people often lean on when faced with this dilemma aren't present within me. I have no passions nor things I want to do, nothing interests me nowadays. I don't want to explore anything about this world, I honestly don't care about the things I don't know. I have no obligation to this world either,

I keep looking at my balcony.. I wanna just jump off. I will never be able to accept myself or who I am. I will always hate myself. I want to leave this life, nothing is holding me back. I don't care about how my family will hate me or miss me or whatever the fuck. I just want to end the life I have no desire in living. Everything hurts. I wish I never existed. People should not have kids. So my mother could suffer for the rest of her life because of that because I will eventually kill myself. My clock is ticking

I can't stop imagining me killing myself. I wanna cut so bad. I wanna take this knife and jam it straight through my arm and slice everything. I want it to be painful, gruesome, bloody, and traumatic. I want to stab myself thousands of times and slowly perish.

I'm in an extremely dark place.. I want to just absolutely gut myself. I dread every single passing day that I am not 6 feet underneath. I regret waking up in the morning every single day. Hell, I even kill myself in my dreams. Thoughts constantly ruminate in my mind throughout the day. I don't care about things that give me small scraps of joy, there is nothing in the world that I enjoy longer than a few minutes at absolute best. I hate everything long term. I hate existing for the long term, I hate existing in general. Maybe life isn't meant for me? I think so.

If you want to call the suicide hotline, don't.. I've called and texted into the suicide hotline dozens and dozens of times and Its definitely not helpful. All they do is have you vent or whatever and then they hit you with the "do something you love" or "you must be very strong to be going through this so long". The time limits are also so obvious, after about half an hour its obvious that they want to get rid of you. And if you have suicidal ideation you basically have to maneuver around it so they don't send people to take you away to the looney bin. They'll say something like "I'm concerned for you're safety, I'm curious, what's your plan and method to end your life?" And if you aren't sure about your safety and have thought it through its a green light for them to send your ass to the psych ward.

This is going to be a temporary solution to multiple permanent problems.. I don't enjoy nor want to live at all. I wish people could respect that. I don't have anything I want to do enough to stay, not only am I horrible at everything, I also have no desire to do anything in the world. I couldn't give less of a fuck about the things I don't know or about exploring anything. Not only do I not have anything I want to do for myself, Nobody wants anything to do with me. I have aspergers so I am an absolute idiot socially and I'm incapable of making friends, and I will be this way the rest of my life. I have never had a close friend, nor a relationship. I'd rather kill myself than go through that process. Nothing anyone can tell me otherwise. If I have to wait literal decades to get a single acquaintance I'd rather just jump off of a bridge. I should have a right to die, I don't have any desire to live so people are only delaying the inevitable. Meaning in life is just a delusion and I hope you all notice that whatever you guys are living is a lie.

Family found out that I wanna kill myself and they tried to give me an intervention and failed embarrassingly. Having 4 people talk me down at the same time, really makes me wanna ruin their lives by killing myself even more. I told them to stop talking to me and leave me alone but they wouldn't So apparently they found one of my suicide notes I threw away in the trash. They told me that if I do it, it would be a life sentence of misery for them. That's selfish in its own right, I shouldn't have to stay alive for them because they will be eternally scarred. I don't care. What happened afterward is a blur of arguments that is hard to put into chronological order. A few statements made me really wish I could shoot myself on the spot. Somebody told me to grow up, he also told me something like "what gets on my nerves is that you won't talk to us but you'll tell a therapist everything". My parent kept pitching ideas of me going into the military to find a purpose in life, what a fucking tool, he also kept pointing out that I wouldn't look anybody in the eyes, I have problems with eye contact with people. And there's many other stuff. They deserve to live the rest of their life with the burden of my death on their shoulders, I hope they spend the rest of their days wondering if it was their fault.

don't go. last year, this month. i was afraid of death. and things got better. now? things just became worse. i've never felt so terrible before, never felt so low, never felt so down my dreams are a better place. waking up to this reality, the same reality but without my treasure, is painful i'm afraid of this new reality where things changed within a few hours. so drastic, so scary, so hurtful i'm being dramatic and sensitive? i'm not sure. just don't go

dear universe, here's a big fuck you, you're not britney spears so stop it. anxiety and depression, they keep me company as i please society. put a smile, be functioning, be successful! no thanks. at least get good grades, a degree, a career, get rich? i'll pass. all i ask for is the permenance of love and care. all i want is not to have my happiness ripped away from me. i've had only just a sip of affection and understanding before it was again replaced with anything but. i do not fear death, i'm just scared of living like this. i don't care about grades and money anymore, they are not rewarding. i'm hollow, i'm burning out, i'm at my lowest low. i hope my candle reignites. this is not a cry for help. i'm just sad so stop playing with my heart and messing with my mind. can't you just be kind?

i feel scared, i don't wanna lose you. in about 4 to 5 hours, i'll get some news. if it is good, i'll be very happy, i hope it will be good news. if it is bad, i guess this is where my story ends in this world. i have come a long way from suicidal ideations but current circumstances are very unfortunate, i hope you will heal, my darling. it isn't that i want to die, that was the past. it is more of a "i don't wanna live without you". all those good grades, trophies, medals and certs mean nothing to me. praises do nothing for me. uni and a degree and a career no longer mean anything to me. i have lost all motivation and drive in life but then you appeared and you gave life meaning. you are beautiful, you are perfect. i have to put up a facade infront of my family and friends, you are the only family and friend that accepts me for who i truly am, my good and bad. and according to you, you feel safe with me too. others drain my energy, others don't make me feel truly happy the way you do. you are a great person, none of this should have happened to you. you will heal, you will recover, you will, right? please come back to me, i'm scared, i don't wanna lose you.

dear universe, here's a big fuck you, you're not britney spears so stop it. anxiety and depression, they keep me company as i please society. put a smile, be functioning, be successful! no thanks. at least get good grades, a degree, a career, get rich? i'll pass. all i ask for is the permenance of love and care. all i want is not to have my happiness ripped away from me. i've had only just a sip of affection and understanding before it was again replaced with anything but. i do not fear death, i'm just scared of living like this. i don't care about grades and money anymore, they are not rewarding. i'm hollow, i'm burning out, i'm at my lowest low. i hope my candle reignites. this is not a cry for help. i'm just sad so stop playing with my heart and messing with my mind. can't you just be kind?

I feel suicidal for stupid reasons and the only reason why I havent acted on it is because nature makes it so hard for me to die without fucking up and becoming a burden to everyone.. I've heard the speech over and over again. "Suicide is a permanent solution to a temporary problem." It sounds like a sensible statement, but when I feel like a worthless POS, it doesn't matter that the problem is temporary, I just want it to end. Yeah go ahead and say that committing suicide is stupid and only weak people do it. You're right; I am stupid and I am weak. I should just die. I know life isn't meant to be easy so stop telling me that. I really do not care. I know other people are going through much worse. Good for them that they're able to deal with it, but I fucking can't because I'm weak and I dont want to feel the way I feel. Its a never-ending battle where I'm always the loser. I wish it wasn't so hard to just end it all. I dont want to become a burden to my family. If I fuck up ending my life, I could just suffer as a vegetable for the rest of my life and be a burden to my parents who have already suffered and survived so much. I know that even if i am successful, everyone I leave behind will suffer but at least I won't be physically there to see it and I know that its very selfish. I will always be a disappointment to my parents and a failure to my younger autistic brother. Sometimes when it gets really bad, I think about just taking us all out altogether, but that would be too selfish and pathetic of me or maybe its not, but I rather not deprive them of the freedom to live or die. I dont have anyone to talk to. I've shut myself off from my friends for months now and I cant bring myself to be a burden to them by telling them my feelings. I dont want to get help because of my family's views on mental health. I dont want to get professional help out of fear they might call law enforcement and take me away and keep me in a psych ward. I dont want that on my record, especially since I'm a college student. I have talked to my counselor during my junior year when I had actually planned on escaping my house during the night to find a car to run me over. She asked if I made a plan to kill myself. My friend had already informed me since she was a student counselor that if I revealed harmful intentions towards myself or other people, they would call the authorities. So of course I said no. It felt good to have someone listen to my problems. And at the time, things did get better, but i dont know if I can wait anymore. I have made a lot of posts on this throwaway and I want to thank everyone who had responded and reached out to me, but idk how much longer I can fight my thoughts. I want to die but I know my reasons to end my life are stupid and I feel pathetic for feeling this way. How stupid does it sound when I write my note and say that I want to kill myself because I failed my driving test 3 times and can't meet the expectations of my parents. Ive tried my best to get their validation. Ive won awards and got into a prestigious university, but my whole life so far has felt like a streak of good luck with occasional bad ones. Maybe its just fucking karma and now I have to pay for all the stupid shit I've done. I dont know if I can survive university. I've heard of the rigor of the courses and the intense competition. I dont even think I deserved to be accepted. I've tried finding outlets such as religion, philosophy, books, activities that used to bring me joy in order to quell my thoughts but just failing to pass my driving test had completely dug a hole into my heart and now I feel my entire soul being painfully sucked into it. I feel so utterly worthless and pathetic. When I revealed my suicidal feelings to my mother during my sophomore year of high school, she asked me why I felt that way. What do I have to feel suicidal for? If I killed myself she told me she would do the same and torture me for eternity. Guess at the time it was enough to keep myself from acting on it, but now I'm not so sure. I dont know where my life is heading. I want to think my studies in university will help me find a meaningful career in the future, but now I just feel so uncertain. I want to embrace the uncertainty, but what I desire now is a feeling of security. I'm 18 so I'm an adult. I guess I am just realizing that I will no longer have the security I had when I was a child. My parents can't care for me forever, but I dont know how to get through with life. I wish I could just live peacefully in a secluded field and not have to worry about getting a job just to survive. I would just live off of nature and spend the rest of my life content with just that. I wish I didnt always have to seek validation from my parents. I know they love me but I hate it when I disappoint them and hear my dad berate me and call me stupid and hopeless. I feel a little better typing out my feelings on reddit. I even sometimes type out details that I never knew I thought about. I've never been diagnosed with depression or any other mental illness so I dont know if i really am depressed. I have suicidal thoughts from time to time and sometimes I almost want to act on them. Sometimes I think back on the instances where I almost wanted to carry them out and think about how pathetic I am. I have talked to people who have felt suicidal on the internet and never knew how to respond. I always think back on those instances and I feel so much guilt. I dont know what to say to them and now that I feel the same way, I dont think i deserve consolation. My feelings just keep going back and forth. I really really hate myself.

I dont want a memorial, a social media post, tears, eulogies; I just want to be forgotten and left alone.

I know that even if i am successful, everyone I leave behind will suffer but at least I won't be physically there to see it and I know that its very selfish. I will always be a disappointment to my parents and a failure to my younger autistic brother. Sometimes when it gets really bad, I think about just taking us all out altogether, but that would be too selfish and pathetic of me or maybe its not, but I rather not deprive them of the freedom to live or die. I dont have anyone to talk to. I've shut myself off from my friends for months now and I cant bring myself to be a burden to them by telling them my feelings. I dont want to get help because of my family's views on mental health. I dont want to get professional help out of fear they might call law enforcement and take me away and keep me in a psych ward. I dont want that on my record, especially since I'm a college student. I have talked to my counselor during my junior year when I had actually planned on escaping my house during the night to find a car to run me over. She asked if I made a plan to kill myself. My friend had already informed me since she was a student counselor that if I revealed harmful intentions towards myself or other people, they would call the authorities. So of course I said no. It felt good to have someone listen to my problems. And at the time, things did get better, but i dont know if I can wait anymore. I have made a lot of posts on this throwaway and I want to thank everyone who had responded and reached out to me, but idk how much longer I can fight my thoughts. I want to die but I know my reasons to end my life are stupid and I feel pathetic for feeling this way. How stupid does it sound when I write my note and say that I want to kill myself because I failed my driving test 3 times and can't meet the expectations of my parents. Ive tried my best to get their validation. Ive won awards and got into a prestigious university, but my whole life so far has felt like a streak of good luck with occasional bad ones. Maybe its just fucking karma and now I have to pay for all the stupid shit I've done. I dont know if I can survive university. I've heard of the rigor of the courses and the intense competition. I dont even think I deserved to be accepted. I've tried finding outlets such as religion, philosophy, books, activities that used to bring me joy in order to quell my thoughts but just failing to pass my driving test had completely dug a hole into my heart and now I feel my entire soul being painfully sucked into it. I feel so utterly worthless and pathetic. When I revealed my suicidal feelings to my mother during my sophomore year of high school, she asked me why I felt that way. What do I have to feel suicidal for? If I killed myself she told me she would do the same and torture me for eternity. Guess at the time it was enough to keep myself from acting on it, but now I'm not so sure. I dont know where my life is heading. I want to think my studies in university will help me find a meaningful career in the future, but now I just feel so uncertain. I want to embrace the uncertainty, but what I desire now is a feeling of security. I'm 18 so I'm an adult. I guess I am just realizing that I will no longer have the security I had when I was a child. My parents can't care for me forever, but I dont know how to get through with life. I wish I could just live peacefully in a secluded field and not have to worry about getting a job just to survive. I would just live off of nature and spend the rest of my life content with just that. I wish I didnt always have to seek validation from my parents. I know they love me but I hate it when I disappoint them and hear my dad berate me and call me stupid and hopeless. I feel a little better typing out my feelings on reddit. I even sometimes type out details that I never knew I thought about. I've never been diagnosed with depression or any other mental illness so I dont know if i really am depressed. I have suicidal thoughts from time to time and sometimes I almost want to act on them. Sometimes I think back on the instances where I almost wanted to carry them out and think about how pathetic I am. I have talked to people who have felt suicidal on the internet and never knew how to respond. I always think back on those instances and I feel so much guilt. I dont know what to say to them and now that I feel the same way, I dont think i deserve consolation. My feelings just keep going back and forth. I really really hate myself.

What is the cleanest, easiest, and most painless way to die?. I feel like I might act on it soon and when I do I want it to be the least painful way to go out. I dont want to leave a mess behind for anyone to clean up and I definitely dont want to fail because that would be so fucking embarassing not only for me but for my parents, not to mention the amount of resources they might have to shell out in case I become a vegetable. It sucks too because I'm basically their only child capable of taking care of them in the future. My brother is on the severe end of the autism spectrum and I had planned to take care of him when my parents became too old to do so, but with my mental state, I guess he's better off with another family member or the government as much as I hate both of those options. Man living is just a fucking bitch. Dying is so fucking hard. And I dont even want to die; I just wish I didnt exist. I wish I could just erase my existence from the universe. I dont want my friends, families, and people I know to remember I existed. I dont think I'm important enough to get a Facebook or Instagram post, but I really don't want that either. I dont want a memorial, a social media post, tears, eulogies; I just want to be forgotten and left alone.

How do I die by carbon monoxide poisoning inside a car?. Thinking about sneaking out in the middle of the night and do it in my dad's car. Maybe drive out somewhere secluded and do the deed. He has a 1998 Toyota Avalon so idk if its possible for me to do it. I will admit I'm killing myself over a dumb reason and I feel selfish killing myself when I have so many loved ones but I honestly just can't take it anymore. Whats the point of living if you're just going to go through this cycle over and over again. One day you feel depressed as hell and it takes a couple days to weeks to find joy in the things you used to do all for it to be a waste because you came across your trigger and just want to end it all over again.. Im sorry but I feel worthless and an utter failure to everyone. I really dont want to involve my friends but I feel I should leave them with something at least. I'm going to start working on my suicide note tomorrow. I'm giving myself one week to find a reason to go on. I know im just running away from problems but so what? You can tell me a permamnent solution to a temporary problem is a bad idea but I honestly don't give a fuck. If I cant get my shit together in a week I'm just going to fucking end it all. I know other people are going through worse shit than I am and I feel utterly stupid for feeling the way I do. I dont see the point in living because I dont understand what living means. What's the difference between living and just existing? I dont know and I no longer care to find out. If anyone has any other suggestions for an easy, clean, and painless way to die, please tell me. And no dont tell me that old age is the best way to die. I appreciate the effort but fuck off. I'm only going to send my note to a few close friends. I honestly just wish that when I die everyone would just forget I ever existed. I dont want any sort of memorial or remembrance. I just want to be forgotten.

It's hard to die.. I always think about dying. I always dream about not existing. I wish that when I die I will be forgotten, but that won't be possible because I know my family and friends will be hurt. But a little part of me also thinks they'll remember me as weak and stupid for ending my life. And thats only if my attempt will be successful. I dont want to risk failing and having to spend the rest of my life as a vegetable. I won't be able to try again and I will only continue to be a burden to my family and probably looked down upon from my friends. I will have nobody and the suffering I can guarantee will be 100x worse. I honestly don't even know if i can go through with my plan. Im drafting my note today and maybe in a week I'll be able to go through with it but I'm also terrified I will fail. I'm choosing carbon monoxide poisoning but I dont know if it will actually work. Things have been better the past few weeks but then I got triggered again and now im in an even deeper depression. Everything just sucks.

Nothing makes sense. I could tell someone I'm suicidal and they might detain me in a hospital. The hospital costs money so my family will be debt. I know they're in debt because of me and my reason for feeling suicidal in the first place is because I feel like a burden and a failure to them. I dont see how that's supposed to make me feel less suicidal. If i go through with my suicde there would be a chance that I fail. Most likely scenario is I become a vegetable and will become an even larger burden on my family. I probably won't have the ability to attempt suicide again and will just continue existing just to suffer. If i do nothing, I'll just keep going through this cycle of feeling okay then feeling super depressed

I dont think i can do it. I wanna die but i can't handle the pain I used to scrape my knuckles on the wall until they were visibly bright red or even bleeding. I did it in middle school for attention and I didnt mind the pain. Now im very hesitant to tell anyone because I dont want to burden them with my problems. I dont want them to feel obligated to "save" me. I'm a college freshman now and I've been having on and off sucidal ideations for maybe about 2 years now. I've thought about different ways to go: jumping in front of a car, bleeding out, hanging, ODing, carbon monoxide. The only thing that has stopped me so far is the thought of failing and leaving my family with crippling debt taking care of me as a vegetable and becoming an even bigger burden on them. I tried scraping knuckles on the wall again. Shit fucking hurt so bad. If im such a pussy and can't handle scraping my knuckle how the fuck am I going to kill myself? Like, I cant even do the most commonly depicted method of self harm which is cutting. I fucking dont want knives near my wrists but I thought about ending my life with one. What the fuck? And whats with the mental health support system in America? You're gonna lock me up in a psych ward for admitting that im suicidal and then slap me with a big fat bill causing me to be even more suicidal? Fuck your mental health awareness month and your parades and stickers and shit. And our teachers had the audacity to say "suicide is stupid its a permanent solution to a temporary problem blah blah blah." "Its selfish to the people who love you" or some other shit. Yeah thanks for the talk. I know its fucking selfish and I dont care if its stupid. I already think I'm worthless so if i can't kill mhself I'll just mindlessly exist and wait for my inevitable end. Hope a car runs me over. It sucks even more that people are going through much worse than what I am going through but here I am wanting to off myself for stupid fucking reasons. I wish i could donate my life to someone who really wants it. It sucks the people who deserve to live have their lives taken away from them but the people who want to die have to continue enduring their pain. God it feels so fucking weird saying that.

Trapped. I wanna kill myself but its too hard. I wanna go to sleep but my mind won't let me. I want to feel "happy" but I cant. My depressive moods are getting longer and longer. It used to only last a couple of days and then I'll feel "happy" for a few days after that. Now I'll feel "happy" for about 5 hours or less and the thoughts start plaguing my mind again. On Thursdays and continuing through to the weekends, it'll last the whole day, but after that, it'll just be like some asshole switching the lights on and off over and over again and I'll go through a cycle of feeling like stealing my dad's car and driving to the tracks and wait for the train to run me over to diligently studying my books and shit and imagining myself being a successful scientist. I wish there latter would happen more often. Maybe I'm setting unrealistic expectations for myself and deep down I know I'll never be the ideal person I wanna be. Even if I get what I want, I dont think I will understand the point of continuing to exist. Everything I do will lead to nowhere. None of us matter in this universe. I just feel like we are little playthings for God to pick and choose who to torture and who to not. This is why I never understood why people always use God to help me feel better. God is cruel and if he were truly kind he wouldn't put other people and myself through this mental torture. People will say God is testing us and if we pass we will be rewarded. I just think at that point, once God has had enough fun putting us through our mental torment, he'll leave us alone and that would be our "reward".

I hate it here. I thought getting into a top college would make everyone proud. After all, I had been working 18 years for this moment to come. But it's still not enough for everyone. Someone always has to remind me of my failures and put me down. Calling me worthless and a failure. I'm sorry I keep failing my driving test. I'm sorry my legs aren't long enough. I'm sorry I'm not tall enough. I'm sorry I'm not pretty enough. I'm sorry I'm not skinny enough. Why do you always have to ask so much of me? Havent I done enough? I had a classmate during my senior year of high school. I was a senior and she was a sophomore. I was the typical female Asian student who obsessed over getting good grades. She was the stereotypical "failure" of a teenager who used substances, ditched classes, and had poor grades. She was my partner for a few weeks. I really liked talking to her. I thought she was funny at times. There was a time when a narc came into our classroom and she panicked and asked me if she looked high. I didnt know what that meant so I said no. The narc went away anyway so she was safe. I was checking my grades on my phone one day and she looked over and commented on them. She asked me how I was able to do it and how she wished she could get good grades as well. I was ignorant at the time and just thought she didnt work hard enough but there were probably many reasons why she couldn't get As in school. Maybe it was due to her environment, her family situation, the influences that surrounded her. She was the kindest person I ever met. I respected her even though she fit the stereotypical Hispanic girl that my parents always talked smack about at home. Sometimes I wonder what it wouldve been like to have her life. She had a good relationship with her mother from what I've heard. Her mother cared for her and supported her. What would it have been like if I didnt obsess so much over grades. If my parents didn't push me to do well in school. If I could have access to Marijuana and use it as an escape from reality from time to time despite knowing it would impair my cognitive function. I'd like to think I would enjoy living a life not having to worry about living up to so many harsh expectations from my family and community. I dont know everything about her life. She must have probably had to deal with many unique problems of her own and maybe she still does. But I wonder if I would still feel the way I do right now if I hadn't been forced to obsess over grades and test scores so much. If I had supportive parents that would've respected my freedom and my choices. I spent so much time worrying about numbers, I dont even really know what I want in life anymore. I just spend my free time on the internet, sleeping, and thinking when my mind won't allow me to sleep. I feel trapped and I hate it.

It's like everything is pushing me towards suicide, but sometimes I find myself distracted from it. When I'm doing my homework or watching online lectures from my professors. But then they come back and I feel like ending it all. I feel like tying the jump rope around my neck and attaching it to a beam protruding from the top of our house and letting go so I could leave this world. I think about stealing my dad's car in the middle of the night and driving it to the train tracks to wait for a train to run me over. I hate being a failure. I hate that knowing that people will think im pathetic because I once felt this way towards people who would joke about suicide or mention their depression. Ive read many posts here and I realize many people cope with this differently. Maybe this is karma. Maybe I need to feel it myself to know how to be a decent fucking person.

If my country wasn't so fucking stupid in handling this pandemic, I probably wouldn't feel this shitty. Finally realized that being in a classroom was the only way I could escape my home environment. I cant fucking focus on my schoolwork and my depressive moods are starting to get in the fucking way of college. Ive been avoiding my friends entirely. I'm usually always the one to start the conversation and after realizing this, I really dont think they ever wanted to talk to me. I feel terrible for bitching about my first world problems. If Anne Frank could stay in an attic with her family for 2 years straight, why can't I. God I told myself I would kill myself before college started, but I decided to give it a chance. My first day of class was today and everyone was so fucking loud. I can only order the only mandatory textbook I need off the actual publishing house, but its out of state and they don't take credit card and I need the textbook by next week.

I know I matter but I still want to do it. I know I have family and some friends that care about me. I know they love me, but sometimes they exhibit it through tough love. I have people who care about me, but I feel like I dont deserve it because I cant live up to their expectations and that is probably why I still want to end my life. I will give it another week.

I hate it here. I thought getting into a top college would make everyone proud. After all, I had been working 18 years for this moment to come. But it's still not enough for everyone. Someone always has to remind me of my failures and put me down. Calling me worthless and a failure. I'm sorry I keep failing my driving test. I'm sorry my legs aren't long enough. I'm sorry I'm not tall enough. I'm sorry I'm not pretty enough. I'm sorry I'm not skinny enough. Why do you always have to ask so much of me? Havent I done enough? I had a classmate during my senior year of high school. I was a senior and she was a sophomore. I was the typical female Asian student who obsessed over getting good grades. She was the stereotypical "failure" of a teenager who used substances, ditched classes, and had poor grades. She was my partner for a few weeks. I really liked talking to her. I thought she was funny at times. There was a time when a narc came into our classroom and she panicked and asked me if she looked high. I didnt know what that meant so I said no. The narc went away anyway so she was safe. I was checking my grades on my phone one day and she looked over and commented on them. She asked me how I was able to do it and how she wished she could get good grades as well. I was ignorant at the time and just thought she didnt work hard enough but there were probably many reasons why she couldn't get As in school. Maybe it was due to her environment, her family situation, the influences that surrounded her. She was the kindest person I ever met. I respected her even though she fit the stereotypical Hispanic girl that my parents always talked smack about at home. Sometimes I wonder what it wouldve been like to have her life. She had a good relationship with her mother from what I've heard. Her mother cared for her and supported her. What would it have been like if I didnt obsess so much over grades. If my parents didn't push me to do well in school. If I could have access to Marijuana and use it as an escape from reality from time to time despite knowing it would impair my cognitive function. I'd like to think I would enjoy living a life not having to worry about living up to so many harsh expectations from my family and community. I dont know everything about her life. She must have probably had to deal with many unique problems of her own and maybe she still does. But I wonder if I would still feel the way I do right now if I hadn't been forced to obsess over grades and test scores so much. If I had supportive parents that would've respected my freedom and my choices. I spent so much time worrying about numbers, I dont even really know what I want in life anymore. I just spend my free time on the internet, sleeping, and thinking when my mind won't allow me to sleep. I feel trapped and I hate it.
